2.TextContent: Tina's cabinet, filled with objects heavy with her memories

3.TextContent: Something is missing from the cabinet.

4.TextContent: Something seems to be missing from the cabinet... The uniform you just obtained seems to fit perfectly on it.

5.TextContent: Tina and Olvera are strategizing how to counter the threat of the massive mecha when, suddenly, a barrage of shells rains down, shattering the bridge beneath them. In the chaos, Olvera pushes Tina to safety. Now stranded on opposite sides of the broken span, Olvera resolves to lead a daring strike behind enemy lines, while Tina stays behind to buy her time and hold the line.

6.TextContent: The massive mecha swings its fist down, ready to crush the platform. Tina summons all her strength, raising her banner spear high to intercept the blow. Metal crashes against metal. The mecha presses harder-Tina falters. You rush to her side, lift your weapon, and brace together. With a final surge, you push back. The mecha stumbles, just slightly-but it's enough.

7.TextContent: The massive mecha steadies itself, lifts both fists, and slams down toward Tina's position. Exhausted, she tries to rise, only to stumble and collapse. Then, from the sky, a blazing beam of light cuts across the clouds, piercing straight through the robot's attack. The massive mecha is destroyed, toppling in a cloud of dust.

8.TextContent: Tina: The Golem is about to reboot! We have to destroy it with the turret before that happens!

9.TextContent: Tina bursts into the main hall from outside. The group immediately begins planning her protection. She objects-but no one listens..

10.TextContent: We have to retake the turret positions up ahead. This is our last chance to stop the Golem!

12.TextContent: A complete map of the The Continent of Magna, with markers on all the places Tina dreams of visiting.

13.TextContent: Several sealed jars, each one storing the power of Wind from different regions of the The Continent of Magna.

15.TextContent: An old painting. The Kanamian children adored Tina.

16.TextContent: Airona and Tina. They looked genuinely happy together.

17.TextContent: Traders from Asterleeds. They treated Tina like family.

18.TextContent: A dusty, timeworn photo. Commander Olvera and Tina appear to have once been very close.

19.TextContent: Something's missing... That medal you just obtained would look right at home here.

20.TextContent: Why does this have to happen now? Let's deal with what's in front of us first.

21.TextContent: Looks like this is a fork in the road.

22.TextContent: It's a fork in the road...

23.TextContent: Don't worry. Just follow the Engram's guidance. The main path looks to be that way.

24.TextContent: But beyond that... I have a bad feeling.

27.TextContent:
Tina begins to struggle again, growling, resisting, trying to shake off the control of Void Engram.
And then, the moment I touch her, resonance is triggered. A brilliant glow flares from her chest, blasting away the Void Engram.
She finally breaks free, collapsing into my arms, sound asleep. The Engram's light gently illuminates her heart. It's time to leave this nightmare behind.

28.TextContent: With the roar of cannon fire, the Golem slowly crashed to the ground. However, when the fire and smoke cleared, Tina had once again vanished before my eyes...

41.TextContent: Airona: Hm... it's not what we're ultimately looking for, but it's definitely useful right now!

43.TextContent: (Through the stone wall, a faint beam of light can be seen in the distance.)

44.TextContent: Airona: Cough... A place like this? Not often to see Engram take shape in such a mess.

45.TextContent: Airona: Until we find the real answer, this one can help restore your strength...

46.TextContent: Airona: Not bad, not bad... I can feel it. Your life force is already being replenished.

47.TextContent: Airona: Explaining everything would take too long... Let's just say Engram is everywhere. They are the foundation of life and balance on this planet.

48.TextContent: Airona: Over there... I can sense a dark presence! The Engram flow is growing faint...

49.TextContent: Airona: And you... through resonance, you can draw upon energy of Engram, of life itself... and this is just the beginning.

50.TextContent: Airona: It's not something just anyone can do. Even someone as strong as myself... can't.

51.TextContent: Airona: That's right. It's not something just anyone can do. Even someone as strong as myself... can't.

52.TextContent: Airona: Maybe... once we solve the mystery of who you really are, you'll know why.

53.TextContent: Airona: But that's for later. Right now, maybe you should focus on one thing-<size=28>stay alive!</size>

54.TextContent: Airona: Let's keep moving in the direction of the signal...

55.TextContent: Airona: We may run into unknown dangers... How are you feeling right now?

56.TextContent: Airona: You strength has faded even more... Don't worry. No matter what happens, I'll protect you.

59.TextContent: Airona: Thanks... Your optimism is kind of infectious. But still, keep an eye on your condition....

61.TextContent: Airona: That Engram Hub ahead is where the local Engram s converge. Wake it from the Void Engram. That energy should help you.

63.TextContent: Airona: It took me so long to find you. I'm not about to lose you again...

65.TextContent:
Ahem... Ahem...
Just as we were about to shift from the Voided Realm to the present... a little something came up.
We're doing our best to bring you a top-tier game experience, but...
Time got away from us. So for now, you'll see these story scenes in sketch form.
It might feel a bit incomplete, but believe me-we're doing everything we can to bring you the best. See you again in the properly finished game soon!

66.TextContent: Airona: With the Engram's energy restored, you should have better control over your body. Charge ahead and try climbing that cliff. You'll get used to your abilities soon enough.

67.TextContent: Stop right there! Where do you think you're going? I'm not done talking to you!

101.TextContent: The items in this cabinet carry Tina's most treasured memories... That medal you just obtained would look right at home here.

102.TextContent: The items in this cabinet carry Tina's most treasured memories... That necklace you just obtained would look right at home here.

200.TextContent:
You strike Grey Crow from behind with a heavy blow. Caught off guard, he falls to the ground.
His minions rush over, but Tina blocks them at the door.
Grey Crow quickly recovers, draws a dagger, and glares at you, ready to

12000.TextContent: The moment your hand touches it, a warm energy floods your body.

12001.TextContent:
We explained the entire plains incident in detail.
Valeria nodded along and gave us a knowing smile.

12002.TextContent:
The registry smells of a mixture of fresh flowers and earth.
Airona says this is what adventure smells like.

12003.TextContent: The Storeowner begins telling the story of the Asterleeds Independence War and the origins of Seabreeze Festival...

12004.TextContent: The Storeowner talks about the Seabreeze Festival's customs...

12005.TextContent: The Storeowner pulls me aside to reminisce about Olvera and Tina...

12006.TextContent:
Seeing his reinforcements scattered, Bertram finally gives up struggling.
Faced with Tina's no-nonsense approach, he reveals the identity of his contact,
and how he's been communicating with "Grey Crow," a spy from the neighboring nation, Byrnhald.

12007.TextContent: A moment later, Tina walks out of The Spinning Rudder.

12008.TextContent:
After a fierce fight, Grey Crow collapses to the ground. Looks like he won't be waking up any time soon.
A document slips from his coat pocket.
My gut tells me this is the secret we've been after.

12009.TextContent: Following Airona's advice, I head to Asterleeds after parting ways at the Cliff Ruins.

12011.TextContent: Despite a few hiccups, I manage to mix the right drink before the customer loses patience.

12012.TextContent:
After switching roles with you, Tina begins greeting customers.
Business is booming at The Spinning Rudder during the Seabreeze Festival, but some secrets are hiding beneath the surface.
After a while, a guest orders a particularly unusual drink. Tina delivers it without batting an eye...

12015.TextContent: Tina locks eyes with me, then shyly steps out.

12016.TextContent:
Before I can react, Tina darts away.
At that moment, I receive a message from Airona-
"I've run into trouble... If you've made some headway, come lend a hand near the city gate to the plains..."

12017.TextContent:
Afterwards, Airona and I (well, mostly me) continued to be active at the Seabreeze Festival.
Before we knew it, we had actually tried every single activity available...

12018.TextContent: Attacking the Thunder Demon Standee with all my might, just as my strength was about to give out, the referee blew the whistle, signaling the end.

12019.TextContent: After filling out the registration information with the staff, Airona and I arrived at the "Thunder Demon Smackdown" competition venue.

12020.TextContent: Just as Airona and I were about to leave, a young boy blocked our path, a cat perched on his shoulder.

12021.TextContent:
I tried to recall my past, but my mind was a blank.
Even that strange dream from before had become hazy.

12022.TextContent: And so, the three of us formed a temporary investigation team, enduring Airona's resentful gazes as we headed deeper into the plains...

12023.TextContent:
No matter how much I struggled, Airona didn't let go of my hand.
My body seemed to be warmed by the most brilliant sunshine, gradually clearing the aura.

12024.TextContent:
Amidst Airona's and my gasps, the Snow Knight slowly removed its headpiece.
Subsequently, appearing before my eyes was a red-haired young girl with a shy expression...

12025.TextContent:
The Man in Black struggled for a moment, then dispersed into the air along with the Void Engram...
Silence returned to the surroundings, as if the Void Engram had never existed.

13001.TextContent:
I quickly report the Void Engram findings to Olvera.
Her calm expression grows even colder after hearing them.

13003.TextContent:
Lamond shares a story from six years ago:
The Seal of Hruga, Tina, the Core of Stellarium, the Guardians...

13004.TextContent:
Before I can react, Tina darts away.
At that moment, I receive a message from Airona-
"I've run into trouble... If you've made some headway, come lend a hand near the city gate to the plains..."

13005.TextContent:
The knighting ceremony is about to begin. The plaza in front of City Hall is packed with excited citizens.
I shuffle forward with the crowd, step by step.

13006.TextContent: Council Chair Lamond steps up to present Tina with a medal, only for Olvera to interrupt the ceremony. The crowd erupts in confusion.

13007.TextContent:
Suddenly, the medal releases a violent surge of Void Engram.
Several citizens are overtaken by the Void Corruption, and chaos breaks out.
Tina, fighting to stay in control, flees the city to protect everyone.
Airona takes off in pursuit. A Man in Black watches from the shadows.

13008.TextContent:
Message from Airona:
"Cliff Ruins. I'm with Olvera..."

13009.TextContent: The citizens have been safely evacuated.

13010.TextContent:
Deep within the Cliff Ruins, a mysterious figure attempts to strike Tina.
With the help of Airona and Olvera, the enemy is successfully repelled.

13011.TextContent: You enter Tina's Mindrealm and manage to awaken her heart.

13012.TextContent: Welcome to the Pioneer Bureau, future adventurer!

13013.TextContent:
A silver-haired woman in uniform appears.
With a cold, sharp gaze,
she surveys the soldiers.
Jerrad glances at her and forces a hopeful smile, gesturing toward me.
As the woman turns her eyes on me, her expression shifts to one of scrutiny and thought.

13014.TextContent: Tina and I successfully locate Grey Crow. After extracting the document's location, we work together to capture him.

13015.TextContent:
A red-haired girl shows up, having heard the commotion.
The nearby citizens quickly ask her to help poor, "wronged" Bertram.
Thinking you're the bully, she confronts you in public.
Meanwhile, Bertram slips away, and the rest of the crowd disperses.

13018.TextContent: Elderly Man: A dependable adventurer, that one!

14001.TextContent:
Healing vines burst from the ground, gently wrapping around Tina. It's Airona, trying to ease her pain.

Reinforcements arrive soon after, only to be stopped by Olvera. One look at her expression tells me: this is not the time to speak.

Olvera won't let anyone else take the risk, not this time. She cradles Tina with a look of sorrow, tempered by resolve.


"Hang in there, Tina... I'll get you home."

14003.TextContent:
Stanley lets out a bitter scoff and shatters the Engram Collector.
Engram bursts forth.
But within moments, the faint hope is swallowed by the toxic gas filling the tunnel.
As panic spreads, Stanley wears a strangely peaceful smile.

14004.TextContent: Tina and I carry Stanley out of the tunnel. For now, the crisis is over.

14005.TextContent: Looks like someone's over there. Let's check it out!

14006.TextContent: (That priest-it's Stanley! What is he doing here of all places?)

100101.TextContent: Traders from Asterleeds. They treated Tina like family.

100102.TextContent: An old painting. The Kanamian children adored Tina. Oddly, it's hanging upside down.

100103.TextContent: Airona and Tina. They looked genuinely happy together.

100104.TextContent: An old photograph. The girls in the photo seem to be very close.

100105.TextContent: Tina: Has the Council already made its decision?

100106.TextContent: Olvera: Yes... I'm still trying. I'll do everything I can to help you.

100107.TextContent: Olvera: I couldn't convince those councilors. I'm sorry... Tina.

100109.TextContent: There's another path over here. Let's go this way.

100110.TextContent: (What's happening?! The memory is collapsing and twisting out of shape!)

200101.TextContent: You grab the man just as he's about to jump and pull him back to safety...

501301.TextContent: An artisan spots you and throws you out.

501302.TextContent: Angry Artisan: Did you hear? Olvera came around recently, accusing us of tampering with the medals.

501303.TextContent: Outraged Artisan: It's infuriating! As if losing Guildmaster Ted and so many seniors wasn't enough! Now she's dragging our name through the mud!

501304.TextContent: Angry Artisan: Yeah! Our seniors gave their lives for victory in the Asterleeds Independence War, but she gets to be the Commander and bask in the glory? It's not fair!

501305.TextContent: Worried Artisan: But... Commander Olvera isn't all bad, is she? She often helps families of the fallen...

501306.TextContent: Angry Artisan: That's just guilt! Playing the good guy so we'll forgive her? Pathetic.

501307.TextContent: Worried Artisan: But when I was sick and couldn't afford treatment, she paid for it... and she even-

501308.TextContent: Outraged Artisan: Oh, so you do remember you're a martyr's kid. Take your handouts and keep quiet. Say one more good word about that woman and you're out!

501310.TextContent: You pull off a flawless act and fool the artisans. They grumble but eventually leave.

501311.TextContent: You hand a bouquet of flowers to a female artisan and mention there's a vegetable sale near the village gate.

501312.TextContent: You calmly explain to the artisans that Olvera is long gone. There's no need to wait here.

501313.TextContent: You cook the patrolling artisan his favorite pigeon soup. He leaves satisfied.

501601.TextContent: Soldiers grow stronger under the influence of the Void Engram!

501701.TextContent: So... there was a rat among us. No worries, I'll take care of it.

501702.TextContent: Oh no! Denvel's coming! Find somewhere to hide!

501703.TextContent: Denvel's finally moved on... That was close.

501704.TextContent: Let's get out of here. I know a secret exit. This way!

501705.TextContent: You and Tina were almost discovered, but Tatta drew attention just in time. After a while, Denvel left the area.

502301.TextContent: Caught by angry citizens. You failed to escape...

502302.TextContent: Fifteen minutes later, the crowd outside begins to disperse. The danger passes, and the doors of The Spinning Rudder reopen...

502501.TextContent: While chatting with a merchant, you fail to notice the Asterleeds Defense Corps soldier slipping away...

502502.TextContent: You're falling too far behind the suspect. Tracking failed!

520701.TextContent:
After transforming into a ghostly form, Tatta goes berserk. It's a dire situation, but Tina arrives just in time. Tata is already exhausted and gasping for air.
Now's the chance! Tina lands a decisive blow while the boy is vulnerable. He collapses.

521201.TextContent:
Wave after wave of Void Spawners come rushing in...
Thankfully, with Airona's help, and after a grueling fight,
the very last Void Spawner falls.

530902.TextContent: You're spotted, but you swiftly take down the soldier before he can raise the alarm.

540601.TextContent: You've been spotted! This isn't the outcome you wanted.

3050701.TextContent:
I had already driven away the goblins, but suddenly the guard behind me let out a cry of surprise, accompanied by the sound of rolling stones-
he fell off the cliff.

3050702.TextContent:
The young soldier who had been laughing and joking suddenly became very serious, with an expression of disbelief on his face.
He asked me to tell him all the information about the Forest Guardians' family.

3050703.TextContent:
So I left the Forest of Monuments before him.
On my way out, I looked back and saw his figure standing as firmly as the lush plants in the Forest of Monuments.
The regiment regularly visits and selects personnel for long-term replacement.

5207009.TextContent:
The document thief has been subdued.
He tries to flee but no longer has the strength...

10211001.TextContent: Rorola: Ancestors' blessing upon us. Evil spirits, be banished!

10211004.TextContent: A roar echoes through the sky as you breach the Storm Barrier.

10211005.TextContent: Rorola: Ominous signs lie ahead. I'll go aid Father. Please, stay vigilant...

10211006.TextContent: Tina: It worked! The resonance took hold!

10211007.TextContent: Dark Mist Legion: Give it up, Kanamians! You can't outlast us!

10211009.TextContent:
After the dragon is defeated, it crashes down onto the first platform.
Rorola and Rotroani fall nearby, not far from the dragon's body.

10211010.TextContent: Rorola: An ominous wind... What on earth happened there...?

30300001.TextContent:
The Council Chair returned to his office, and when he came back to the second floor, he handed me an envelope.
Inside, along with the military report just delivered by the Corps, was a ticket for a ship departing from Asterleeds.

30300002.TextContent: Narulu watches you worriedly from behind a pillar.

30300003.TextContent:
When the seagull flew back for the second time, Narulu and I said goodbye.
He wiped his nose, clutching the crumpled ticket, and looked back every few steps.
"Next time we meet, let's watch the sea together again!"

30300004.TextContent:
Narulu ran into a nearby hut.
Not long after, he came and stuffed a paper ball into my palm.

30300005.TextContent:
Rain fell from the sky.
The already heavy air grew even thicker.

30300006.TextContent:
The Lightning Core suddenly split open a chasm-like rift, then dissipated.
The moment it dispersed, the earth trembled, and a tremendous roar tore through the sky.
In an instant, lightning, arcing with deadly precision, split the air and struck towards me...

30300007.TextContent: In a flash of lightning, Narulu dashed in front of me, arms outstretched.

30300009.TextContent: When the seagull flew by a second time, Narulu said goodbye to me.

30300010.TextContent: Narulu: Let's come to the beach again!

30301101.TextContent:
When Narulu vanishes, the Lightning Storm Core disappears with him.
The weather returns to normal, but something even more ominous appears in the place the core once occupied-

30301102.TextContent:
The moment I touch the sigil, a massive surge of Void Engram erupts, nearly swallowing me whole.
Just in time, Narulu rushes in and yanks me to safety.

30301103.TextContent: Narulu: Denvel consumed my body with Void Engram. When I regained consciousness, I discovered its power flowing through me.

30301104.TextContent: Narulu: From that moment on, I could feel it... my life's countdown had begun.

30301105.TextContent:
Despair and bitterness hang heavy in the air.
No matter how many times I try to resonate, the Void Engram only grows thicker, ready to consume Narulu completely...

30301201.TextContent:
Before Narulu can finish his words, pain twists across his face.
He suddenly collapses, as though all his strength has drained away.

30301202.TextContent: A surge of lightning crashes down. Narulu shields you from the blow. Miraculously, he's completely unharmed.

30301203.TextContent:
Tatta walked into the nearby woods.
Soon, the howls of Goblins began to echo from within...

30301204.TextContent: Priest Stanley hands over the Engram Collector.

30301205.TextContent: <style="emph-gn">{*me.name*}</style>, I'm so glad you're here... Please watch over the priest for me, okay?

30301206.TextContent: Airona lifts the Legacy and channels Engram into the Void Unit.

30301207.TextContent: It's the Dark Mist Legion! Airona and the others are in danger!

30301301.TextContent:
A familiar figure climbed out of a barrel.
It's Narulu. That kid actually snuck over here...

30301302.TextContent: With a rumble, two clouds of black mist rise across the plains. As they clear, one reveals a massive lightning storm over Minsterhorn. The other exposes a chaotic, twisted Forest energy.

30301303.TextContent:
Without warning, he stands up and runs straight into the blade before him.
It all happens too fast, too silently. All that remains is a shocking pool of red.

30302101.TextContent:
The village is shrouded in a lightning storm, the energy condensing into a massive electric sphere.
Lightning monsters surround the villagers, and one young boy stands between them, defending the people with all he's got.

30302102.TextContent:
I told Airona what happened in Minsterhorn.
The girl who was always smiling was silent for the first time.

30302201.TextContent:
O golden friend, whom I hold dear-
Your past was the path of migrating birds
Etched into the wind-kissed wilds
Your future was the spark before the dawn
Lighting the long night, ushering morning's first light
Sleep in peace now, golden friend
At the river's end, beyond time's reach
We'll find our way there
And meet again...

30302202.TextContent:
Olvera returns dragging a crate.
She opens it and calmly pulls out 20 lightning orbs...
"Just in case," she says flatly. "This should be enough, right?"

30302203.TextContent:
Everyone, be cautious of Engram Anomaly.
-They're disasters caused by a breakdown in local Engram balance, often due to elemental disruptions. They're very troublesome.
At the anomaly's center, a Core will form. That's the Core of the chaos. If you can resonate with it, you may be able to temporarily stop the anomaly.

-Airona

30302204.TextContent:
Just when we are out of ideas, Olvera and Jerrad return.
They see the sigil on the ground and look deeply concerned.

30302205.TextContent: Narulu loved the sea. I laid him to rest under a tree by the sea.

30302207.TextContent: In a flash of lightning, Narulu hurls himself in front of me and takes the full force of the strike head-on!

30302208.TextContent: Narulu: I can't hold these things back much longer...

30302209.TextContent: Narulu: You guys... need to go...

30302210.TextContent: I remember when I first saw his youthful face. My chest aches.

30302211.TextContent: Narulu, why did you break our promise?

30302213.TextContent: Your past is like the path of migrating birds,

30302214.TextContent: etched across the open fields, kissed by sea breezes.

30302215.TextContent: Your future is like the starlight before dawn,

30302216.TextContent: piercing the long night, heralding a new morning.

30302218.TextContent: At the river's end, where time itself runs dry,

30302219.TextContent: we will reach our final destination,

30302301.TextContent: (Cutscene Tier 3) As the Void Engram spreads beyond control, Narulu is consumed by Void Corruption and turns against the others.

30302302.TextContent: Narulu was struck down, fully fused with the Void. Olvera delivers the coup de grce.

30302401.TextContent:
Visibly shocked, Tatta is taken away for treatment.
"Broken bones hurt too! You'd better come visit me! Oooouch!!!

30302402.TextContent: The cat meows sadly, circles us once, and then run off toward Minsterhorn...

30302403.TextContent: The door creaks open and a strange cat darts out, circling around me nonstop.

30302404.TextContent:
Denvel knocks you Airborne. Tatta takes a serious hit while trying to protect you, nearly killed by Denvel.
At the last moment, Tina steps in with the relic, shielding everyone.
Reinforcements arrive, and Denvel retreats, unwilling to prolong the fight.

30302405.TextContent:
Airona's Message:
I've made a breakthrough on how to counter the Void Sigil.
Meet me at Andra Resting Post!

30302501.TextContent:
We carry the wounded, walking between darkness and dim light. I've long lost track of how much time has passed.
Perhaps because the corruption is getting worse, my vision gradually blurs.
Just as I'm about to collapse, someone catches me.
It's Tina.
"Partner, go rest first! Trust me, I'll get everyone out of here."
But Tina, you look like you're about to fall too...
She smiles and shakes her head, turning once more toward the darkness.

30302502.TextContent: At the last moment before they lose consciousness, Airona casts a spell. The black mist surrounding the couple dissipates and eventually vanishes. We return to the Forest Warden's Hut, bringing them and the cat along with us.

30302503.TextContent:
It is as if age has fallen on them all at once.
Everyone remains silent.
Only the wind passes by, carrying away the silent tears. They support one another as they walk slowly toward Minsterhorn.

30701301.TextContent: Lothar is encircled by his worshippers, patiently answering their various questions. The protagonist and Boyce watch this scene. In the subtitle, Boyce explains why he was initially distant toward the protagonist. Just then, Lothar notices the protagonist and Boyce, apologetically nods to those around him, and makes his way toward the pair through the crowd.

30702101.TextContent:
(2D image - Darya's letter)
(What messy, grimy handwriting-every line goes in a different direction. It feels more like a set of mysterious runes, with odd doodles crammed into the corners...)
(Airona was right-just making sense of this letter is already a trial of strength!)

30702102.TextContent: Shows a gathering spot for scattered merchants: a few large backpacks and two NPCs chatting in a small group, while a lone merchant nearby looks troubled over his wares.

30702104.TextContent:
Follow the secret merchant team into the mining area
The protagonist's group blends in with the team, making their way through the mining area toward the Beckmar Transport Station-when suddenly, Darya bursts out from the roadside and dives into the group.

30702105.TextContent: The caravan is organizing and placing goods, Boyce and Darya stare at each other as if they have something to say.

30702201.TextContent: The building entrance is heavily guarded, while clerks work inside at the counters.

30702301.TextContent:
Chase the fleeing merchant and fight the Blackstone Squad troopers they summon.
Defeat the attacking Blackstone Squad troopers. Enemies HP is locked, triggering an escape sequence when reduced to minimal HP.

30703101.TextContent: Follow Grieg to rescue the besieged miners The protagonist's group arrives, and the thief rats abandon their high ground attack to start attacking the protagonist.

30703102.TextContent: Grieg stood up and backed away. Airona seems to sense something and gazes into the distance (toward the Ruby chamber).

30703202.TextContent: Soldiers are sitting in the mountain tavern in small groups, with only one soldier sitting alone at the bar, not ordering anything.

30703203.TextContent: Play a card game with Mathis.

30703211.TextContent: Anxious Soldier: Boss, boss!? The roof here is still broken, it hasn't been fixed at all, it's just covered with a piece of wood.

30703212.TextContent: Dissatisfied Soldier: Something fell into the soup bowl from the crack! What's worse is that I couldn't see what it was!

30703213.TextContent: Anxious Soldier: Dew? Dust? Or bugs?... Ahhh, I can't take it anymore, where's the boss!? At least give us a new meal!

30703214.TextContent: Anxious Soldier: The boss fell asleep at the counter again, and her daughter isn't here either. Now there's no one in charge at all.

30703215.TextContent: Dissatisfied Soldier: Forget it, let's just change seats ourselves-hey, you grab the stuff.

30703216.TextContent: Anxious Soldier: So should we still take this soup? What exactly fell into it...?

30704101.TextContent: Troopers are searching for suspicious persons. The protagonist's party is hiding.

30704102.TextContent: A miner helps the protagonist divert the soldiers.

30704201.TextContent: The protagonist and Airona enter a room filled with refined Ruby, along with tracks and transport minecarts that are clearly frequently used. Airona stops at each scene point, touching and sniffing to investigate.

30704202.TextContent: In the distance, an important figure (with a sergeant among their entourage) enters the mining zone, but from the protagonist's angle, only their profile is visible.

42001601.TextContent:
The vehicle suddenly erupts with a burst of fireworks, making people all around stop in their tracks, eyes glued to the scene.
Before things get out of hand, the Asterleeds Defense Corps rush in, dispersing the growing crowd...

42001602.TextContent: With a few sharp clanks of his wrench, Schmidt finishes his modifications on the vehicle.

42051101.TextContent:
The three scrambled to set up their portable stove, and the camp instantly turned into a culinary battlefield.
Ezekiel's blade flashed, the Skyfish membranes in his hands transforming into transparent slivers as thin as cicada wings.
Sera ground the brine into fine blue stardust, slowly infusing it into the mousse.
A dessert named "Skyfish Jelly Cloud" was miraculously born.

Translucent Skyfish membranes adorned with rich mousse foam.
Azure brine granules are like scattered starlight, evenly sprinkled around the edge of the plate...

42052101.TextContent:
Ereka deftly retrieved a miniature crucible from a hidden spot on a nearby reef,
clearly something she had carefully hidden there earlier.
Then, she meticulously crushed and carefully ground the ingredients needed for the potion,
skillfully concocting a deep, dark green medicinal liquid...

42052102.TextContent:
A flash of white light, and the "Ereka" who had accompanied me earlier suddenly disappeared.
In her place stood a tall man with overly pale skin and cunning eyes...

50310001.TextContent:
No matter how I switch up my attacks, Jerrad parries them all with effortless grace.
There's no way it doesn't get to me.
As if sensing my frustration, Jerrad lowers his weapon and gives me a casual wave.
"We've been going at it for a while. How about we take a break?"

56030101.TextContent: Darya: You cheat! Take this fireball!

56040101.TextContent: Darya: Huh? The torches all went out... Something's wrong here

56040201.TextContent: Lost in the darkness of the mine

101010100.TextContent: I slowly open my eyes, finding myself lying in a bed at the inn. Everything from that dream... already slipping away.

101010101.TextContent: I step out of the bedroom and hear voices arguing downstairs. I head down and see a green-haired girl in a standoff with the tavern owner.

101010102.TextContent: As we head for the Asteria Plains, we pass by a mysterious adventurer in a wide-brimmed hat.

101010103.TextContent: A white-haired girl seems to be in a heated argument with Tina. Tension crackles in the air between them.

101010104.TextContent:
We run into Tina on the plains. After helping a stranded merchant and defeating the Void Spawners summoned by the Man in Black,
Airona and I return to the Pioneer Bureau in Asterleeds.

101010107.TextContent:
I'm just about to inspect the tracks more closely when Airona shouts:
"{*me.name*}, get back!"
A surge of Void Engram floods the area.
The next thing I know, I'm falling fast in the air...

101010108.TextContent: That Man in Black must have the containment vessel for Void Engram.

101010109.TextContent: I grab the clothes Airona left for me. Guess I'll change into them soon.

101010110.TextContent: With Airona's guidance, I manage to fit the headwear properly.

101010111.TextContent:
Using Airona's voucher, I open the chest before me.
Inside is what looks like a weapon core and some gear enhancement materials.

101010112.TextContent: Using Airona's voucher, I open the chest. It's a card, pulsing faintly with mysterious energy.

101010113.TextContent: Under Lady Airona's tutelage, I finally learned how to use the Adventurer's Handbook.

101010114.TextContent:
After a fierce battle, the trial comes to an end...
I feel like I've come to better understand how I fight.

101010115.TextContent: After more training, I finally resonate with the Battle Will. A surge of energy courses through me.

101010117.TextContent: Panicked Merchant: You've got to help her! Please!

101010118.TextContent: Red-haired Girl: How bad is it?

101010119.TextContent: Asterleeds Defense Corps Soldier: Not too serious... I just got terrified. My legs are still shaking...

101010120.TextContent: Red-haired Girl: Don't worry. I'll get you back to safety.

101010121.TextContent: Asterleeds Defense Corps Soldier: Thank you, Lady Tina...

101010122.TextContent: A few days ago, someone asked me to track down some food stolen by Goblins.

101010123.TextContent: Wasn't hard to find those little creeps. But when I got close, guess what I saw?

101010124.TextContent: They were about to toss you in the pot for dessert!

101010125.TextContent: No way I was leaving you behind, so... I brought you back with me!

101010201.TextContent: ???: Subject 71 has reached the target's core!

101010202.TextContent: ???: Sir! This time... I think... we did it!

101010203.TextContent: ???: Subject 71! The secret to breaking free from civilization's limits lies right before you!

101010204.TextContent: ???: Tell me... What do you see?

101010205.TextContent: You: I... I can't see clearly...

101010301.TextContent: ???: Don't you get it?! If you keep this up, you'll destroy everything!

101010302.TextContent: Girl: I can't hold this thing back much longer!

101010303.TextContent: Girl: We've resonated. Now it's your turn. Take it from here!

101010304.TextContent: Girl: My power will take shape through your imagination. I believe in you... You can Master - It!

101010305.TextContent: Girl: Thank you! You've got real courage!

101010306.TextContent: Girl: My power is yours to wield. So go wild with it!

101010501.TextContent: Manifested Calamity: You're too late! Nothing can stop me now!

101010502.TextContent: ???: Over here! I won't let her lay a finger on you!

101010601.TextContent: Manifested Calamity: The end is written... This world will be reborn in ruin...

101010701.TextContent: Manifested Calamity: All of this... will fade into nothingness right here!

101010702.TextContent: ???: The world you seek is but a nightmare. Wake up!

101010703.TextContent: Manifested Calamity: From these ruins, paradise shall be reborn!

101010801.TextContent: Tina: No way. Don't tell me that thing's the one creating the Void Engram?!

101010802.TextContent: Airona: A coward's tricks. Nothing more.

101010803.TextContent: Man in Black: No... No, no, no, NO! My beautiful Void Engram! It's ruined! You barbarianthis is an insult to art itself!

101010804.TextContent:
Man in Black: Wait... No... Airona? Tina?!
No, no, no! Fate is cruel! Today... today is surely the day I perish...

101010805.TextContent: Airona: What a drama king. Save your breath and surrender. Now.

101010806.TextContent: Man in Black: Never! I will defend beauty till my final breath! The Void Engram Maestro will not be defeated!

101010808.TextContent: Airona: I won't let him succeed!

101010902.TextContent: Girl: What's with that scared look? I was the one keeping watch, you know. You slept like a baby thanks to me...

101010903.TextContent: Girl: Shouldn't you be saying something like, "Thank you, Lady Airona"?

101011001.TextContent: Airona: Still... I didn't think we'd see each other again. You really did make it back...

101011003.TextContent: Oh, right! I guess you don't recognize me like this. But believe it! Standing right before you is the one and only Lady Airona!

101011007.TextContent: Airona: Hey... Can you hear me?

101011009.TextContent: Tina: Is the Void Engram messing with your body? You don't look right...

101011010.TextContent: Airona: So it wasn't going to go smoothly after all... No, I have to stay calm...

101011011.TextContent: Airona: It's fine. I can wait. Time heals all wounds...

101011012.TextContent: Tina: Wait! Your hand! Look at your hand!

101011017.TextContent: Tina: At this rate, it's going to be a matter of life and death!

101011019.TextContent: Airona: Don't worry. I've got this...

101011020.TextContent: Airona: That Engram Hub ahead is where the local Engram s converge. Wake it from the Void. That energy should help you.

101011021.TextContent: There's... a connection between you and the Engram of this land.

101011022.TextContent: It's guiding you somewhere... Could it be... the key to stopping the fading?

101011024.TextContent: Yes! Whatever it's pointing to, just follow it! Maybe it'll lead us to the answer!

101011301.TextContent: Airona: Whew... You're stable for now. The Engram is flowing into you. It's holding the fading at bay.

101011302.TextContent: Airona: How do I even put this... You're... something truly special.

101011303.TextContent: Airona: Engram is the lifeblood of Regnus. It flows deep within the planet, cycling and pulsing through the land.

101011304.TextContent: Airona: And you... you were always meant to be connected to that energy.

101011305.TextContent: Airona: Just like a flower draws life from the soil, you exist through the nourishment of Engram.

101011306.TextContent: Airona: But lately... the Void Engram has started spreading across the plains...

101011307.TextContent: Airona: It's corrupting the Engram here...

101011308.TextContent: Airona: If it keeps spreading unchecked... it could cost you your life!

101011309.TextContent: Airona: That's why we have to clear it out.

101011310.TextContent: Airona: Don't be afraid. We'll figure this out. Let's keep tracking that adventurer.

101011401.TextContent: Airona: Why are you just standing there? Come on.

101011402.TextContent: Airona: Feels good to walk on the The Continent of Magna again, doesn't it? Welcome back.

101011403.TextContent: Airona: This is the Asteria Plains, a lush region at the southern tip of the Continent of Magna.

101011404.TextContent: Airona: The ancient Bapharian Divines Ruins are everywhere, filled with Legacies and danger.

101011405.TextContent: Airona: Years ago, war left its scars on this land...

101011406.TextContent: Airona: Some once-open villages turned inward, closed themselves off...

101011407.TextContent: Airona: But that didn't take away her beauty. This place is vast, full of wonder, just waiting to be explored.

101011501.TextContent: Airona: We're in Asterleeds now, the most vibrant city in all the plains. It's full of life and surprises!

101011502.TextContent: Airona: Culinary enthusiasts gather in the Food District, trading recipes and hunting for flavor...

101011503.TextContent: Airona: Fashion designers showcase dazzling new looks...

101011504.TextContent: Airona: Master artisans forge powerful weapons from Bapharian Legacies...

101011505.TextContent: Airona: It really feels like... whatever you're searching for, you'll find it here.

101011506.TextContent: Airona: Oh, and perfect timing. We're right in the middle of the Seabreeze Festival! It's the most exciting time of the year in Asterleeds!

101011507.TextContent: Airona: You're going to fall in love with this city... I just know it.

101011510.TextContent: After an intense battle, Abeku is finally subdued.

101020101.TextContent: Tatta: You know, if you'd all just come at once, it'd save us a lot of time.

101020102.TextContent: I'm with the Pioneer Bureau. There's no need to stay on guard.

101020103.TextContent: They asked me to negotiate with you, but as an adventurer, I'm staying neutral.

101020106.TextContent: Tatta: Don't talk to me like I'm a kid you can just smooth over.

101020107.TextContent: I saw you trying to save those Asterleeds Defense Corps soldiers trapped by your own flames. That's not something the Dark Mist Legion would do.

101020108.TextContent: Tina and I both think you're not a bad person. If there's something you're not saying... now's your chance.

101020110.TextContent: Badly hurt. They're still being treated.

101020111.TextContent: Tatta: I never meant to hurt innocent people. That wasn't my intention.

101020112.TextContent: Tatta: Sorry... that's all I've got to say.

101020113.TextContent: The document you took were highly classified. For Asterleeds... It's vital.

101020115.TextContent: Tatta: I'm just a petty thief. I was hoping to grab something valuable, that's all.

101020116.TextContent: Stop dodging. Dragging this out won't help anyone.

101020117.TextContent: Tell me what you know about the Dark Mist Legion.

101020118.TextContent: They've already started making moves against Asterleeds... and if this keeps going, we could be in serious trouble.

101020119.TextContent: Tatta: We have to stop them.

101020122.TextContent: You do realize the situation you're in, right? Whatever your goal was... it's over.

101020123.TextContent: She doesn't go easy on enemies. And I really don't want it to come to that.

101020125.TextContent: The surge in Void Corruption... that's connected to the Dark Mist Legion, isn't it?

101020126.TextContent: More and more innocent people are getting eroded. Are you just going to stay silent?

101020127.TextContent: Tatta: I never wanted it to get like this...

101020128.TextContent: Tina remembers your face. Three years ago... you were the one who saved Denvel, the leader of the Dark Mist Legion.

101020130.TextContent: Tatta: I'm not denying it... So what if I did?

101020131.TextContent: How about this. You give me everything you know about the Dark Mist Legion... and I'll make sure they let you go.

101020132.TextContent: Tatta: So I really am just a kid to you, huh?

101020133.TextContent: Tatta: Your precious Council Chair already said the same thing just now.

101020134.TextContent: Tatta: Guess Asterleeds has a script for everything... even how to lie.

101020135.TextContent: Tatta: Denvel... yeah, he did something terrible. No way to undo it.

101020136.TextContent: Tatta: But he was manipulated. That's not the man I knew...

101020137.TextContent: Tatta: Tell me this... what are you going to do with me? We don't have much time left.

101020138.TextContent: That's not my call to make... But...

101020139.TextContent: Just tell us what you know, and I'll do everything I can to get you the best outcome.

101020140.TextContent: Tatta: Vague promises aren't what I'm here for.

101020141.TextContent: You still don't get your situation, do you... Tatta of the Dark Mist Legion.

101020142.TextContent: You don't get to ask the questions. You're here to answer them.

101020143.TextContent: Tatta: Then we've got nothing left to talk about, do we... oh noble interrogator.

101020144.TextContent: Don't worry. Asterleeds will treat you well.

101020146.TextContent: Given how important you are to the crisis...

101020147.TextContent: Until we get intel on the Dark Mist Legion...

101020148.TextContent: Tatta: No! Stop! There's no time!

101020149.TextContent: Tatta: That guy... he gave Denvel a power he couldn't control. Now Denvel's completely consumed by it.

101020150.TextContent: Tatta: He's going to use the Void Engram to wipe out all of Asterleeds!

101020151.TextContent: So the surge of Void Engram on the plains... It was all the Dark Mist Legion?

101020152.TextContent: Tatta: I'm trying to stop it. If I can just wake Denvel up, we can avoid this war and stop the destruction.

101020153.TextContent: Tatta: That's why I need that document. It might have a clue... something about the man who gave him that power.

101020154.TextContent: Tatta: Please... tell me. What happened one year after the Asterleeds Independence War started?

101020155.TextContent: Jayden, Denvel's lieutenant, died during the war. It happened in the Towering Ruin.

101020156.TextContent: After the war, Denvel refused the recall order from Byrnhald... and kept leading the Dark Mist Legion against Asterleeds.

101020158.TextContent: Tatta: That's all the document said? Nothing else?

101020159.TextContent: The document gives a detailed account of the Andra Landing Battle.

101020160.TextContent: Denvel lost a lot of his men there... Maybe that's why his hatred for Asterleeds runs so deep.

101020161.TextContent: Tatta: War did this to him... War changed him...

101020162.TextContent: Tatta: But that's not what I'm looking for.

101020163.TextContent: I'm not authorized to share any more intel from Asterleeds.

101020164.TextContent: Unless you're willing to give us actionable information on the Dark Mist Legion... then I can show you the document.

101020165.TextContent: Tatta: I won't do anything that could hurt Denvel.

101020166.TextContent: Tatta: But we're out of time... please...

101020168.TextContent: Tatta: No... No way! You think I'll fall for a cheap trick like that?

101020169.TextContent: If Jayden's the one you're looking for, you might as well give up.

101020170.TextContent: Tatta: To me, Denvel and Jayden... they're like family.

101020171.TextContent: Tatta: Ever since the day the war began, I've had one wish... that they'd both come home.

101020172.TextContent: Tatta: But they didn't... Neither of them ever came back.

101020173.TextContent: Tatta: Please... Let me go to the Towering Ruin. If I can find Jayden, it might be the only way to wake Denvel up!

101020174.TextContent: They won't just let you walk out of here. But if you tell us where the Dark Mist Legion is... we'll help you reunite with them.

101020175.TextContent: You can use Asterleeds' power to bring your family back together.

101020176.TextContent: Tatta: So this is my only choice...

101020177.TextContent: Tatta: This is a letter Jayden wrote to me three years ago. Everything I know from it... I've already told you.

101020178.TextContent: Tatta: I'll take you to the Dark Mist Legion... we'll stop Denvel. But after that... please... let me take him home.

101020179.TextContent: You can rest assured on that.

101020180.TextContent: We have to stop them... That's all I can say.

101020181.TextContent: No matter how long it takes... they'll keep you locked up.

101020183.TextContent: Until we get intel on the Dark Mist Legion, you won't be going anywhere.

101020184.TextContent: You might be our only lead.

101020201.TextContent: Tavern Owner: Alack... Are you sure this is okay?

101020202.TextContent: Airona: Of course! Once the one upstairs wakes up, we'll split the final reward. Thirty-seventy. I get seventy. Fair, right?

101020204.TextContent: Airona: Oh hey, you're up! Come on, come on!

101020205.TextContent: Airona: So? Feeling rested? Room comfy? Like the new outfit? I picked it out just for you-

101020206.TextContent: Airona: Hmm... still foggy, huh? Guess you were out for a while. Maybe this will snap you back to reality...

101020207.TextContent: Airona: Hand over anything valuable, will ya?

101020301.TextContent: Citizen: Whoa! Check out that outfit!

101020302.TextContent: Citizen: No way... Bertram's actually... handsome?!

101020303.TextContent: Citizen: Lady Tina! Lady Tina's here!

101020304.TextContent: Citizen: Lady Tina, quick, look at Bertram-

101020306.TextContent: Tina: Bertram, are you seriously... Is this some new Seabreeze Festival style?!

101020403.TextContent: Tina: I suggest you start spilling. Cooperate and things go easier.

101020406.TextContent: Bertram: I'll talk I'll talk I'll tell you everything!

101020407.TextContent: Bertram: Please have mercy, Lady Tina haaaughhhh!!

101020408.TextContent: Tina: See? That's more like it.

101020409.TextContent: Bertram: Lady Tina... here's what happened...

101020410.TextContent:
"Tina, wait!"
A familiar voice suddenly rang in her ears.
It was Olvera...
Tina saw her, and her face briefly froze.

101020501.TextContent: Arrogant Sergeant: Watch where you're going!

101020601.TextContent: Priest: Starsoul Flasks can be collected over here.

101020603.TextContent: Airona: Huh, where's the Starsoul Flask Fafala gave us?

101020703.TextContent: Darya: We can't start a fight... at least not here.

101020704.TextContent: Cold Sergeant: Not enough hands. Bring five more.

101020901.TextContent: Taltraud: Oh? Are you looking for me?

101021303.TextContent: Reiner: I'll ask one more time.

101021305.TextContent: Grieg: I take full responsibility. I'm Grieg.

101021308.TextContent: Grieg: He's innocent! Come at me instead!

101021309.TextContent: Reiner: I'm not here to punish you. Just don't forget this.

101021310.TextContent: Reiner: Keep an eye on them. Don't let anything happen.

101021313.TextContent: Informer: I reported it right away today, so maybe...

101022102.TextContent: ???: I grant you a blade... one that can sever fate!

101030201.TextContent: Lamond: At this moment of honor...

101030202.TextContent: Lamond: Tina, will you do the honors and place the medal yourself?

101030203.TextContent: Lamond: As everyone knows, Tina has made extraordinary sacrifices to protect the city.

101030208.TextContent: Tina: My head... it hurts... I can't hold it back...

101030212.TextContent: Olvera: That direction... no... this is bad!

101030213.TextContent: Olvera: Jerrad, I'm putting you in charge here!

101030215.TextContent: Olvera: All remaining units, follow Jerrad's lead! Protect the civilians and raise security!

101030217.TextContent: Lamond: This Seabreeze Medal, she is truly deserving of it.

101030302.TextContent: Olvera: I'm leaving this to you.

101030402.TextContent: Olvera: There's gotta be something I can do to help...

101030502.TextContent: Airona: Huh? They got away? <style="emph-gn">{*me.name*}</style>, don't let them escape!

101030503.TextContent: Airona: Olvera, glad you made it.

101030504.TextContent: Abeku: Those two guys in the way up ahead!

101030505.TextContent: Abeku: Get out of my way!

101030801.TextContent: Narulu: You look terrible. What happened?

101030904.TextContent: Narulu: Every time I see you, I think of my brother...

101030905.TextContent: Narulu: Even though... you two don't look alike at all.

101030906.TextContent: Narulu: Why do you look so... sad?

101030907.TextContent: Narulu: It doesn't suit you... at all...

101030908.TextContent: Narulu: I want to see you smile... <style="emph-gn">{*me.name*}</style>. We'll meet again someday, on the other side. And when we do...

101030910.TextContent: Narulu: Every time I see you, I think of my sister...

101030911.TextContent: Narulu: Thanks for being part of my life...

101040101.TextContent: Olvera: Soldiers, to stop this thing, we need to infiltrate the Byrnhald flagship and destroy their control room!

101040102.TextContent: That's way too dangerous, Olvera... I'm coming with you...

101040103.TextContent: No. I need you to lead the troops. Hold the enemy line. If I don't make it back... you're the new commander.

101040106.TextContent: I'll hold the line... but I'm not interested in being commander. You'd better come back alive, Olvera!

101040201.TextContent: No way anyone made it... Don't go, Tina. I don't want to lose you too.

101040202.TextContent: Why are the defense systems activated?! They are still inside! You promised they'd make it out safely!

101040203.TextContent: People are saying you abandoned your own comrades and allies... Is it true?!

101040204.TextContent: I'll bear the consequences. It was all for Asterleeds...

101040205.TextContent: Then there's nothing left to say. Move.

101040206.TextContent: You can't go. That's an order!

101040208.TextContent: Then I'm officially resigning from the Asterleeds Defense Corps. You have no authority over me now, Olvera!

101040301.TextContent: I declare that Seal Watchers Tina shall submit unconditionally to the Council's oversight. Management protocols take effect immediately!

101040302.TextContent: I... I'm not a burden to Asterleeds...

101040303.TextContent: You can't take my freedom away!

101040408.TextContent: Tina: I'll... I'll crush you... All of you... EVERY LAST ONE OF YOU!!!

101040409.TextContent: I... I'm not a burden to Asterleeds...

101040410.TextContent: You can't take my freedom away!

101040702.TextContent: Tina: The ritual... I have to... protect everyone...

101040703.TextContent: Tina: Get out! Get out of my body!!!

101040901.TextContent: "At the moment light was first seen in the sky, a blessing from the Divine descended through the clouds. From that point forward, civilization began."

101040902.TextContent: The blessings of Bapharian brought prosperity to all things. However, a race known as the Igdia chose to stand against them.

101040903.TextContent: They claimed to be guardians of the continent, but were eventually driven out by the Divine several thousand years ago.

101040904.TextContent: Two hundred years ago, Hruga, a descendant of the Igdia, brought the Void Engram from the night. Since then, the The Continent of Magna has fallen into decay.

101040905.TextContent: In that time of crisis, a messenger of the Divine appeared. Using a legendary power known as the Core of Stellarium, the messenger sealed away Hruga, ending the disaster.

101040906.TextContent: When the Asterleeds Independence War began, The Seal of Hruga was broken, and the threat returned to the continent.

101040907.TextContent: Lady Airona, Tina, and another warrior from Byrnhald entered the heart of the The Seal of Hruga in search of a way to resolve the crisis.

101040908.TextContent: It may have been in response to their efforts that the messenger of the Divine appeared once more.

101040909.TextContent: In a moment of desperation, they fused the shattered Core of Stellarium into Tina and the other warrior, saving them both.

101040910.TextContent: From then on, they became interdependent with the sealing power, becoming the guardians maintaining the seal's stability.

102010201.TextContent: Boy: Denvel... I'm taking you home...

102010203.TextContent: Jerrad: Tina... Rookie... don't let this guy get away...

102010205.TextContent: Flames of fury, burn everything to ashes!

102010208.TextContent: Airona: Wake up, don't be... deceived...

102010301.TextContent: ???: The priest will be here to help soon!

102010302.TextContent: ???: I, I will definitely... hold on until then!

102010702.TextContent: Darya: Don't act... at least not here.

102010703.TextContent: Grim Sergeant: We don't have enough people. Grab five more.

102020201.TextContent: Agitated Trooper: Weren't we supposed to bring the caravan leader? Who's this guy?!

102020202.TextContent: Flustered Trooper: W-we need to report to the commander, now!

102040102.TextContent: Denvel: Our long-held wish is finally within reach.

102040105.TextContent: Tatta: Is he trying to trap this place with Void Engram?

102040106.TextContent: Tatta: We need to get out of here now.

102040107.TextContent: Tatta: I think there's another path over there. Go!

102040201.TextContent: Denvel: Jayden? Why am I remembering this now? I won't go back!

102040202.TextContent: ???: Denvel... are you going to betray yourself too?

102040203.TextContent: Denvel: Betray? I haven't betrayed anyone!

102040204.TextContent: ???: Your anger... your vow to avenge your comrades and Jayden... Are you going to turn your back on all of it?

102040205.TextContent: Denvel: Jayden... Yes... I'll win for them. I'll destroy Asterleeds.

102040206.TextContent: ???: Let your anger burn, Denvel. I shall grant you the power to act on it.

102040208.TextContent: Tatta: Please... take care of this for me.

103020105.TextContent: Olvera: You don't have to carry this alone.

103020108.TextContent: Narulu: I didn't make it in time to join the Corps...

103020109.TextContent: Narulu: I still... couldn't become someone my parents could be proud of...

103020110.TextContent: Olvera: Your name will always have a place in the Asterleeds Defense Corps.

103020113.TextContent: Olvera: You've always been someone we're proud of.

103020201.TextContent: Airona: This is bad! These monsters are going out of control again...

103030102.TextContent: Denvel: Quit struggling. It won't work.

103030104.TextContent: Tatta: I can't believe you've become this.

103030105.TextContent: Tatta: You betrayed your oath as a knight...

103030106.TextContent: Tatta: I will make you answer for what you've done...

103030108.TextContent: Denvel: What oath, what wrongs? It's just your wishful thinking.

103030206.TextContent: Denvel: What a troublesome little pest.

103030208.TextContent: Denvel: Go ahead... Enjoy your final struggle.

104010101.TextContent: Voice of an Elder: Ancestors bear witness! Warriors of Kanamia! Once again, your blades have driven back the enemy!

104010103.TextContent: Voice of an Elder: Now let us see... who dares to challenge the Kanamia Tribe, blessed by our ancestors?

104010104.TextContent: Airona: This isn't good... Things just got worse...

104010105.TextContent: Rotroani: Olvera?! You traitor! How dare you show your face here!

104020102.TextContent: Spirit Ted: The assault of the Byrnhalds... came earlier than intel predicted.

104020103.TextContent: Spirit Ted: We gave it everything we had...

104020104.TextContent: Spirit Ted: But there were too many of them.

104020105.TextContent: Spirit Ted: Most of the artisans... never made it out.

104020106.TextContent: Spirit Ted: But we had no time to mourn. That was only the beginning of the nightmare.

104020201.TextContent: Spirit Ted: With Olvera's support, we finally secured the last defensive system.

104020202.TextContent: Spirit Ted: When I handed Olvera the ignition key...

104020203.TextContent: Spirit Ted: I knew then... we still had a chance to win.

104020302.TextContent: Tupok's Log: We all knew... at this rate, no one was getting out.

104020303.TextContent: Tupok's Log: Then... Yaretsi appeared. She'd gotten separated earlier. She had an idea

104020304.TextContent: Tupok's Log: Lure the enemy toward us... buy Commander Olvera enough time to reach the activation controls.

104020305.TextContent: Tupok's Log: She blew the bone flute one last time.

104020401.TextContent: Ted: Thank you, young adventurer. Please do me one last favor.

104020402.TextContent: Ted: Tell Olvera... let go of the past and keep moving forward.

104030601.TextContent: Olvera: That's... a Void Sigil! No!

104030602.TextContent: Tina: Wait... that's... it's the Kanamia Tribe!

104030603.TextContent: Rorola: Ancestors' blessing upon us... Father... everyone... please be safe...

105030101.TextContent: Denvel: Tch. Look at you, flailing around... How pathetic.

105030102.TextContent: {*me.name*}: No matter what... I will stop you...

105030103.TextContent: Denvel: The more insignificant the lifeform... the more it struggles.

105030104.TextContent: Denvel: How disgusting you are... you pathetic bug!

105030106.TextContent: {*me.name*}: Is this... really... as far as I can go?

105030108.TextContent: {*me.name*}: Everyone's still counting on me... This can't be the end!

105030201.TextContent: Denvel: Stop getting in my way.

105030206.TextContent: Tatta: Denvel, you won't harm them!

105040201.TextContent: Denvel: Still struggling? What a pitiful farce!

105040202.TextContent: Denvel: Perish with the Void Mist, you wretched worms!

105040301.TextContent: Denvel: What... what are these memories?!

105040309.TextContent: Denvel: Out of my way! I'll destroy them with my own hands!

105040310.TextContent: Airona: We can't let the Hruga's Horn fuse with him again. This is our chance!

105040601.TextContent: Man in Black: Hmph. Hruga will be most pleased when she sees this.

105040604.TextContent: Tina: Please! Wake up! It's me, Tina!

105040605.TextContent: Tina: There has to be a way...

105040606.TextContent: Tina: I'm going to bring you home!

105040608.TextContent:
Tina has released the Core of Stellarium. Light falls into her hands like raindrops.

The vitality swallowed by the Void Mist gradually returns through the light.

The Core of Stellarium still glows. It's like someone far away is calling their names, which are filled with light.

By the time I come to my senses, the mist still lingers on my clothes, but the sky before me has changed.

130100102.TextContent: Denvel: Another... Imagine Seed? This has to be a joke!

130100103.TextContent: Denvel: My revenge... is not over yet...!

130100401.TextContent: Tatta: Be careful, everyone! Don't let the Void Mist take control of you!

130100404.TextContent: Dark Mist Troopers: Yes! Lord Denvel!

130100501.TextContent: Corrupted by the Void Mist, swallowed by darkness...

130100601.TextContent: {*me.name*}: (Continue investigation following Denvel's trail. He must be deep inside the fortress.)

130100602.TextContent: {*me.name*}: (What a massive gravity device. It seems to be a Legacy of the Divine...)

130100603.TextContent: {*me.name*}: (Gravity has forged a new path. Move forward. Track Denvel down!)

130100701.TextContent: {*me.name*}: (Gravity is destabilizing and the Void Corruption is collapsing!)

130100702.TextContent: {*me.name*}: (Stay close to the vacuum zones between the two Void Corruption fields to escape downward.)

130100801.TextContent: Disrupted gravity gradually recovers, and the Void Corruption fades away...

201020100.TextContent: Airona: Things sure are lively... Well, it is the Seabreeze Festival after all. <style="emph-gn">{*me.name*}</style>, I hope you're ready for how energetic the Asterleeds can get.

201020104.TextContent: Mascot: Oh? You here to join the Pioneer Bureau too?

201020105.TextContent: Mascot: What a fresh and adorable reaction! Come, come, this must be fate!

201020106.TextContent: Mascot: Let me show you around-

201020107.TextContent: Girl: Hey, hey... that's enough already!

201020108.TextContent: Mascot: Well if it isn't our Miss Smiles! You're here!

201020109.TextContent: Girl: You again... Quit messing with the Novice and get back to being the Cat Mascot. Go keep the kids entertained!

201020110.TextContent: Mascot: Fine, fine! I'll leave this cute rookie in your care then...

201020115.TextContent: Girl: Today's the Seabreeze Festival in Asterleeds. That person earlier, the one dressed as the cat Vita, is one of the festival mascots.

201020118.TextContent: Valeria: Sorry about that... I'm Valeria, the Pioneer Bureau's resident Miss Smiles.

201020119.TextContent: Valeria: Put simply, I'm kind of like... the guide character in video games, helping out confused Novices?

201020121.TextContent: Valeria: And with that... Welcome to the Pioneer Bureau!

201020301.TextContent: Jerrad: Huh? Weren't you just at the Pioneer Bureau earlier?

201020302.TextContent: (Getting ready to exchange a code phrase)

201020304.TextContent: "Commander, I pledge my loyalty to you!"

201020307.TextContent: Jerrad: Wait, let me think... Yeah, I think I get it now.

201020308.TextContent: Jerrad: You're the adventurer Valeria brought in... I mean, recommended to help us, right?

201020309.TextContent: Jerrad: Congratulations! You're now officially part of our Special Operation Squad!

201020310.TextContent: Jerrad: No, no, don't get me wrong. I recognized you just fine, see?

201020311.TextContent: Jerrad: But just so we're clear... I'm not the commander of the Corps.

201020312.TextContent: Sharp Female Voice: Why is everyone standing around like that? What's going on here?

201020313.TextContent: Jerrad: Aha... and here comes the real commander.

201020314.TextContent: Sounds like I just got played.

201020315.TextContent: Grit: Ugh... how can someone dance better than me?! Nana... my sweet Nana...

201020316.TextContent: Sunny: I didn't lose... I just... ran out of stamina...

201020322.TextContent: Bertram: This is outrageous! Someone back me up here!

201020323.TextContent: Bertram: This outsider just accused me of being a traitor colluding with the enemy!

201020324.TextContent: Old Lady: A traitor? At the Seabreeze Festival? Where would one even come from?

201020325.TextContent: Teenage Girl: No way. Bertram is way too cute to be a traitor.

201020326.TextContent: Old Man: Even an adventurer shouldn't throw out baseless accusations... Maybe it's a mistake?

201020327.TextContent: Young Man: Bertram's with the Corps. That guy must be talking nonsense.

201020328.TextContent: (Looks like I'll have to take a more direct approach to make him talk...)

201020330.TextContent: Bertram: Y-You... what are you trying to do?!

201020332.TextContent: Bertram: No... my stylish hair color... I can't hide it anymore!

201020334.TextContent: Teenage Girl: Whoa... that hair is dazzling...

201020335.TextContent: Auntie: I never imagined Bertram under that cap would be this handsome...

201020336.TextContent: Little Girl: Bertram's head looks like it's made of candy! So cool!

201020337.TextContent: Young Man: Gotta love the Seabreeze Festival... There's always something going on.

201020341.TextContent: Olvera: This is Tina's necklace. I didn't realize... she always kept it close.

201020342.TextContent: Olvera: You take it. I hope it brings you back safely.

201020350.TextContent: Tina: Ta-da! Not bad, right? Even the Grey Crow won't recognize me in this!

201020352.TextContent: Tina: Here, this one's for you. Come on, get changed!

201020354.TextContent: (No backing out now... Guess I have no choice but to put it on.)

201020355.TextContent: Tina: Looks great on you! Come on, let's go in.

201020360.TextContent: Tina: What exactly is written in that document?

201020361.TextContent: Tina: Byrnhald's making a big move over this...

201020362.TextContent: Tina: You're funny. Whatever it is, just open it and find out, right?

201020365.TextContent: Jerrad: So you two were the ones who caught the Grey Crow? That's seriously impressive!

201020366.TextContent: Jerrad: Especially you, rookie! Color me impressed!

201020368.TextContent: Olvera: Tina... hand me the document.

201020370.TextContent: Olvera: Those damn Byrnhald bastards, plotting to turn Tina against us!

201020371.TextContent: Olvera: This is worse than we thought. Tina, for now, it's best you don't leave the city.

201020373.TextContent: Tina: I would never betray anyone! And you don't have the right to order me around, Olvera.

201020374.TextContent: Jerrad: Alright, alright, you two! We caught both the spy and the mole today. Can we just enjoy that?

201020375.TextContent: Jerrad: And come on, the whole Kanamia Tribe incident was ages ago. Let's not start fighting the second you see each other...

201020378.TextContent: Jerrad: Oh no... I should've kept my mouth shut!

201020379.TextContent: Olvera: Tina... I'm sorry about what happened back then with Kanamia...

201020380.TextContent: Olvera: But looking at the situation, leaving the city without clearance isn't the right call...

201020381.TextContent: Tina: Commander, if there's nothing else, I'll be on my way.

201020382.TextContent: Jerrad: Tina, I mean... the Dominion still your partner, after all-

201020383.TextContent: Tina: This is my partner. We worked pretty well together today.

201020384.TextContent: Tina: So it's settled. Next time, we're teaming up again, okay?

201020387.TextContent: Hehe, I saw Lady Airona waiting here...

201020388.TextContent: Got curious who the lucky one was...

201020389.TextContent: Wait... she was waiting for you?

201020390.TextContent: Didn't expect that. Looks can really be deceiving...

201020391.TextContent: No way I'm just standing around today...

201020393.TextContent: Guard duty's already got us stretched thin...

201020394.TextContent: I was just passing by City Hall...

201020396.TextContent: Also, if you two show up at the ceremony...

201020397.TextContent: Tina would be happy for sure!

201020407.TextContent: Hang in there, Tina... I'll get you home...

201020408.TextContent: I know what to do now...

201020409.TextContent: Olvera, take care of Tina for now...

201020413.TextContent: It's a curse... one that can summon a Void Corruption army to consume the continent...

201020415.TextContent:
Message from Airona:
"Cliff Ruins. I'm with Olvera..."

201020418.TextContent: Tina: Here, this is for you.

201020419.TextContent: So that big cat in front of the Pioneer Bureau earlier... that was you?

201020420.TextContent: Stay safe, rookie! Catch you later!

201020421.TextContent: (Head to the <style="emph-gn">Entertainment District</style> to look for witnesses.)

201030102.TextContent: (Is that an old man crying in the crowd?)

201030103.TextContent: Waaah... Canceling the knighting ceremony... How could they... It's just too much...

201030104.TextContent:
Tina gazes up into the sky, then shifts her attention toward the noisy crowd below.
She slowly steps forward.
The people, at first upset or restless, fall silent as Tina appears. Their eyes begin to fill with anticipation and admiration.
In that moment, Tina makes her decision.

201030105.TextContent: Tina: The one standing here now... is Tina, a warrior of Asterleeds.

201030106.TextContent: Tina: My heart belongs to the sea breeze. My soul is one with the waves. And with these hands, I protect our land and waters.

201030107.TextContent: Tina: Sea lilies on the shore, birds soaring through the sky, and Asterleeds... I ask you all to bear witness.

201030108.TextContent:
As the elder's voice fades, the crowd erupts.
One after another, they step forward, demanding the ceremony resume.
With tensions rising and soldiers unable to hold the crowd back, Tina exhales and takes on a more serious expression.

202010201.TextContent: Airona: What are you doing here? Hold on... that presence...

202010203.TextContent: Filthy humans... vile servants of the god of lies!

202010205.TextContent: Abandon your futile fight-I shall purge your sins!

202010206.TextContent: You think you can stop my descent?

202010207.TextContent: (What's happening to me...? I need to find Airona quickly...)

202010208.TextContent: After Airona and I left the Council Chair's office, Olvera, who had been silent on the side, suddenly spoke up.

202010209.TextContent: Narulu proudly took out three party invitations from his pocket and handed two of them to Airona and me.

202010210.TextContent:
Then, Jerrad escorted the cursing Kakater away.
Narulu, not wanting to keep his parents waiting, also went home.

202010211.TextContent: In the end, only a few of us were left by the coast.

202010212.TextContent: Airona walked up to the cat. Looking right into her eyes.

202010213.TextContent:
Kitten meowed softly at her.
Airona nodded and returned to our side.

202010214.TextContent: Kakater reluctantly flipped over a blank card.

202010216.TextContent: The game was at a stalemate due to Kakater's cheating.

202010218.TextContent: Meanwhile, the situation at the card table was also becoming increasingly troublesome.

202010219.TextContent: Kakater kept cheating and refusing to exchange cards, and my patience was about to reach its limit.

202010220.TextContent:
"In that case, don't blame me for showing no mercy. "
"All of you-go feed the sharks!!"
No sooner had the words left his mouth than Kakater pulled out a smoking cake and hurled it hard at the ship.

202010221.TextContent: Wait, why cake?... Why is the cake smoking??

202010222.TextContent:
Before I could figure it out, the next second, a thunderous explosion sounded.
The ship exploded.

202010223.TextContent: Taltraud turned and marched straight toward a nearby restaurant, leaving the three of us exchanging bewildered looks.

202010224.TextContent: When I found Taltraud, he was staring helplessly at a counter full of colorful drinks, while the Storeowner beside him looked utterly defeated. The moment they saw me, both of them lit up

202010225.TextContent: Mongrace saw his sincere attitude and did not make things difficult for him anymore.

202010226.TextContent:
After we finished tidying up the shop, Mongrace brought over four drinks. "Consider it a reward from the sea breeze! Welcome to take care of my business again! "
And just like that, our clumsy little part-time adventure came to an end.

202010227.TextContent:
After returning to the seaside, we gathered around and shared the drinks.
Airona looked miserable drinking her lemonade, while Tina, on the other hand, was beaming with joy.

202010228.TextContent:
We reported the series of events to the Council Chair.
He pondered for a moment and nodded.

202010229.TextContent:
Operation White Night officially began.
At the time, I didn't know that this adventure would bring a storm like no other...

202010230.TextContent: After we cleaned up the mess, she even kindly gave us four drinks.

202010231.TextContent: Just like that. The small incident came to an end.

202010301.TextContent: Olvera: Looks like no one's here. Guess we got lucky.

202010305.TextContent: Dorothy: Out! Now! Get out of here immediately!

202010306.TextContent: Dorothy: Olvera, one more step and the next shot's going through your skull!

202010401.TextContent: Olvera: Found him. Ryan's right over there.

202010403.TextContent: Ryan: I did everything you asked. Now give my family back...

202010404.TextContent: Dark Mist Lieutenant: Heh! Didn't think you Asterleeds were this naive.

202010405.TextContent: Dark Mist Lieutenant: You're useless now. Keeping you alive would just cause trouble.

202010407.TextContent: Olvera: I knew it... It's them!

202010408.TextContent: Dark Mist Lieutenant: Say goodbye to the world.

202010409.TextContent: Olvera: Protect Ryan! We can't let them succeed!

202010501.TextContent: That's the boy who stole the classified document!

202010502.TextContent: Tina? I'll handle that little thief. You go rescue the others!

202010601.TextContent: He's with the Dark Mist Legion?! If I'd known that, I would've gone all in! No way I'd lose to a guy like that... Still, thanks...

202020001.TextContent:
At that moment, Ruby glanced at me from the side.
"It's you-" she exclaimed softly.
Before I could react, the girl quickly pulled me into a corner.

202020002.TextContent: In the moment the old man was distracted, Tina and I stepped forward and restrained him.

202020003.TextContent:
Just then, reinforcements from the Asterleeds Defense Corps arrived and took away the man who was trying to cause trouble again.
Before leaving, his eyes still burned with hatred.

202020004.TextContent: I told Tina the story of Saphir and the Seabreeze Girl.

202020005.TextContent:
Tina didn't speak, she just gently held Saphir's hand.
The girl's eyes seemed to light up for a moment.
She held Tina's hand back and tears flowed down.

202020006.TextContent:
Tina nodded, holding Saphir's hand tightly.
The girls chatted by the beach-from distant lands to nearby sand and shells, eager to share all things beautiful with Saphir.
When starlight fell and the moon rose, Saphir and Ruby left.
Tina watched them go, as if gazing at the moonlight.

202030303.TextContent: Denvel: Taltraud... never thought I'd see you siding with Asterleeds. How disappointing.

202030304.TextContent: Tatta: Denvel, I didn't come here to talk about that!

202030305.TextContent: Olvera: Tina, you said you wanted to stop this war. Let me be the one who makes that happen.

202030306.TextContent: Olvera: Now is our best chance.

202030307.TextContent: Tina: Adventurer, escort Tatta out of here.

202030308.TextContent: Denvel: Then let your defeat mark the beginning of Asterleeds' downfall!

202030310.TextContent: Denvel: A shame, really. I wanted the two of you to watch as I crushed Asterleeds myself.

202030312.TextContent: Tatta: No! Your fight is with me!

202030313.TextContent: "Denvel... surrender yourself to her. She will give you everything you desire."

202030314.TextContent: "Dream on! I'm no one's puppet! I'll defeat Asterleeds by my own will!"

202030315.TextContent: "Is that so? I'm sure we'll meet again."

202030316.TextContent: "War is the worst path to peace. As a commander, it's my duty to keep casualties to a minimum."

202030317.TextContent: "No matter what I face on the battlefield... I will never betray my beliefs."

202030319.TextContent: "We lost... the Dark Mist Legion actually lost!"

202030320.TextContent: "This happened because of your naivety. There is no justice in war, only victory... and defeat."

202030321.TextContent: "Let go of your foolish ideals. Hruga will grant you victory."

202030322.TextContent: "Stay back, bastard! What did you do to me?!"

202030327.TextContent: Denvel: Tatta... right... we promised we'd go home...

202030328.TextContent: Hruga: Denvel, are you betraying yourself too?

202030329.TextContent: Denvel: Betray? I haven't betrayed anyone!

202030330.TextContent: Hruga: Your anger... your vow to avenge your comrades and Jayden... Are you going to turn your back on all of it?

202030331.TextContent: Denvel: Jayden... Yes... I'll win for them. I'll destroy Asterleeds.

202030332.TextContent: Hruga: Let your anger burn, Denvel. I shall grant you the power to act on it.

202030333.TextContent: Tatta: Please... take care of this for me.

202030335.TextContent: Jayden: Don't be sad, Tatta. Once the war's over, Denvel and I will come back.

202030336.TextContent: Denvel: That's right. We'll return after we defeat Asterleeds.

202030337.TextContent: Denvel: Take care of yourself until then.

202030338.TextContent: Tatta: Okay... But you both have to come back. I'll be waiting right here!

202040201.TextContent: Man in Black: It has absorbed enough strength from Void Engram. Commander Denvel, your wish is about to come true!

202040202.TextContent: Denvel: So this is what it looks like, now that it's regained full power... Three years of guarding it... is worth it.

202040203.TextContent: Denvel: Ah... I can feel it... This power is surging into me!

202040204.TextContent: Man in Black: It's time to fulfill our agreement, Commander Denvel. Eliminate the Seal Watchers.

202040206.TextContent: Denvel: The Seal Watchers... and all of Asterleeds. Their end is here.

202040207.TextContent: Denvel: I've waited far too long for this day. Now... they'll know what it feels like to lose everything.

202040208.TextContent: Denvel: We are marching on Asterleeds. Full assault!

203010702.TextContent: Airona: Come on, let's go check it out!

203010802.TextContent: ???: This is punishment from the Divine!

203010804.TextContent: Stanley: I offer myself to your will, to cleanse this tainted world and punish humanity for its sins...
