203010808.TextContent: Stanley: Sinners blinded by ignorance... prepare to receive divine judgment...

203010809.TextContent: Airona: There's something we need to talk about...

203010901.TextContent: Ha. You fools, you don't actually believe you've won, do you?

203010903.TextContent: Oh? Why don't you kneel and beg me first?

203010904.TextContent: My patience wears thin. Now, this is your last chance. Explain now, or die.

203010906.TextContent: Such a decisive commander. Unfortunately, our Lord Denvel is more calculating, more insightful, and more strategic...

203010908.TextContent: Hehe, patience. You stand no chance against Lord Denvel. Just watch and see.

203010909.TextContent: (Is that Denvel and Jayden next to Tatta?! Why do the three of them look so close?!)

204010101.TextContent: Olvera: So this is it... the place Priest Stanley called the <style="emph-gn">area of exceptionally rich Engram..</style>

204010102.TextContent: Olvera: Turns out it's the Kanamia Tribe's territory.

204010103.TextContent: Airona: Just as I thought... Matches perfectly with my investigation-

204010104.TextContent: Airona: This is also the only place near Minsterhorn that hasn't been affected by the Void Cataclysm.

204010105.TextContent: Airona: Hmm... but a theory is just a theory.

204010106.TextContent: Airona: If we want to uncover the village's secrets, we'll need to investigate it ourselves.

204010107.TextContent: Nierala: What's wrong? You don't seem like yourself today.

204010108.TextContent: Jabba: Went hunting yesterday... Tsk, got hit by a Caprahorn.

204010109.TextContent: Nierala: May the Ancestors protect you! Are you alright? Was it serious?

204010110.TextContent: Jabba: Just my leg. But it'll be a while before I can hunt again.

204010111.TextContent: Nierala: If only we could hold another blessing ritual for the ancestors... Just one sip of the spring water they blessed, and you'd be back on your feet in no time.

204010112.TextContent: Jabba: Yeah... but who knows when we'll be able to perform that ritual again...

204010115.TextContent: Elder Villager: Still no sign of Yaretsi?

204010116.TextContent: Young Villager: I'm sorry, Elder. That area's just too dangerous. We couldn't get very far.

204010117.TextContent: Elder Villager: Alack... We'll have to think of something else. The Forbidden Zone's been sealed off for far too long.

204010118.TextContent: Elder Villager: A few warriors got injured while hunting recently... Without the spring water, they won't recover anytime soon... Alack...

204010119.TextContent: Young Villager: I'll gather more people and keep looking!

204010125.TextContent: Nervous Villager: Hey, I've got something creepy to tell you.

204010127.TextContent: Nervous Villager: That kid Rorola... It's like she's possessed. She keeps talking to herself, every single day.

204010129.TextContent: Nervous Villager: No idea! I saw her when I went fishing. She was talking to a mirror!

204010130.TextContent: Calm Villager: Did you catch what she was saying?

204010131.TextContent: Nervous Villager: It sounded like a chant... Ya-Re-Tsi?...

204010132.TextContent: Calm Villager: Yaretsi? That was her sister... Poor child.

204010133.TextContent: Strict Villager: Iruka! You little rascal. Did you dry the hides today?

204010134.TextContent: Young Villager: May the Ancestors protect you. Uncle Kuri, I did finish before I went out to play.

204010135.TextContent: Strict Villager: Don't give me that! I just checked. They're full of bugs. Be honest. Where'd you run off to this time?!

204010136.TextContent: Young Villager: I... I was under the eastern cliffs... praying to the ancestors... so Dad's injury would heal.

204010137.TextContent: Strict Villager: Huh, you went there again. Sorry, Iruka. I was too harsh just now.

204010138.TextContent: Strict Villager: It's true that there hasn't been a blessing ritual there in a long time. Next time, I'll go with you.

204010201.TextContent: Airona: The Forbidden Zone's just over there... and way more heavily guarded than I expected. What a hassle.

204010202.TextContent: Airona: I bet guarding duty in the Kanamia Tribe is a pretty competitive job...

204010203.TextContent: Airona: Move carefully, <style="emph-gn">{*me.name*}</style>. I'll meet you at the gate of the Forbidden Zone.

204010401.TextContent: Airona: That should be the <style="emph-gn">Council Hall</style> up ahead.

204010501.TextContent: Kanamia Resistance: ... This wagon is empty, it's a <style="emph-gn">trap</style>!

204010601.TextContent: Rotroani: May the light shine eternal, Ancestors' blessing upon you.

204010602.TextContent: Rotroani: First is the initial trial-

204010603.TextContent: Rotroani: Warriors! Today, the Kanamian ancestors shall witness your resolve and courage!

204010604.TextContent: Rotroani: I hereby declare the Kanamia Brave Trial begins!

204010605.TextContent: Rotroani: I am Rotroani. In the name of Kanamia Chieftain, I hereby declare

204010606.TextContent: Rotroani: The Kanamia Brave Warrior Trials are now officially open!

204010607.TextContent: Rotroani: Only those who return with trophies from the hunt may proceed to the next round.

204010608.TextContent: Rotroani: Now go into the forest, warriors!

204020101.TextContent: Adventurer, look at this desolate Wander Site.

204020102.TextContent: All the beauty that once was, destroyed by war...

204020103.TextContent: Now, although new sprouts have grown on this scorched land...

204020104.TextContent: The hearts of the Kanamia tribesmen still bear great wounds from the betrayal of Asterleeds.

204020105.TextContent: Ted: That day, we worked with our Kanamian allies here to set up defenses.

204020106.TextContent: Ted: I remember this place. It was here that Yaretsi blessed us, as per the customs of Kanamia.

204020108.TextContent: Ted: I remember now! This is definitely the place!

204020109.TextContent: Ted: The artisans gave their lives here, but we fulfilled our final mission.

204020110.TextContent: Ted: And... this is where I became like this.

204020111.TextContent: Tupok's Log: We might be the last ones alive. Everyone is badly injured and can't move...

204020112.TextContent: Tupok's Log: Commander Olvera remained on the front line, trying to get us out.

204020202.TextContent: No way... Byrnhald troops?! At a time like this?

204020203.TextContent: Bad intel! It's an enemy attack! Go alert Olvera! Now!

204020302.TextContent: The last remaining artisan finished installing the defense systems... and handed the activation device to Olvera, who had just arrived with reinforcements.

204020303.TextContent: I can't imagine what kind of brutal battle the artisan must have gone through to get this far.

204020304.TextContent: When Manny, barely clinging to life, struggled to pass me the activation device from beneath the rubble...

204020305.TextContent: He asked me to do one thing, to finish the final task: activating the defense systems.

204020306.TextContent: It was the hope left behind by the fallen artisans, the Kanamians, and the soldiers of the Asterleeds Defense Corps... paid for with their lives.

204020311.TextContent: Olvera: This time... it's really goodbye, Uncle Ted.

204020312.TextContent: Ted: Take care of yourself, Olvera.

204020314.TextContent: May our will become wings... and guide her out of this nightmare.

204020402.TextContent: Only two left! Go! Capture that officer alive!

204020403.TextContent: Yaretsi, no hostiles for now. The exit's just ahead. We-

204020406.TextContent: It's my fault. I wasn't strong enough... I couldn't get you out...

204020407.TextContent: Rest in peace... I'll finish the defense system activation myself.

205010101.TextContent: Airona: This tremor... it's coming from the direction of Asterleeds...

205030101.TextContent: Cough... cough... What a touching little act. I should be applauding you.

205030102.TextContent: You again. Still running your mouth? Just surrender already!

205030103.TextContent: Hah. Maybe this plan failed... but squashing a few bugs like you? That's still easy.

205030201.TextContent: Olvera: The decisive battle is imminent, I have also dispatched the Corps to Dark Mist Fortress.

205030202.TextContent: Olvera: In other words-Tina, at this moment, it's just the two of us here.

205030203.TextContent: Tina: Yes. Finally, a good chance to have a fair fight with you!

205030204.TextContent: Tina: How about we make it quick?

205030205.TextContent: (These two people don't seem to be in a hurry at all... Could it be...)

205030206.TextContent: Allan: Tina, are you resisting arrest?!

205030207.TextContent: Lamond: Tina's strength is exceptional, even the captain can't defeat her easily.

205030211.TextContent: Allan: --What's going on?! Where is she?!

205030212.TextContent: Olvera: I deeply apologize, Your Excellency. It was my negligence that allowed Tina to escape. We will go after her immediately.

205040202.TextContent: Resident: Thank you for saving the plains.

301010303.TextContent: When Tina saw that it was me, she stepped out from the shadows.

301020101.TextContent:
After a fierce fight, Grey Crow collapses to the ground. Looks like he won't be waking up any time soon.
A document slips from his coat pocket. My gut tells me this is the secret we've been after.

301020102.TextContent:
After a fierce fight, Grey Crow collapses to the ground. Looks like he won't be waking up any time soon.
My gut tells me the document he's given up is the secret we've been after.

301030201.TextContent:
Before we could stop her, Tina had already taken the pages and started looking through them.
She then seemed to understand something and gave us a reassuring smile.

301030301.TextContent:
Afterwards, no matter which shop Airona and I went to, the Storeowner would relay the same message.
"To you, the two adventurers who accepted the diary commission, I am waiting for you in Arena Town."

301030401.TextContent:
"I just hope that you two can keep the contents of that file confidential."
After saying this, Olvera bowed to us and left with the Asterleeds Defense Corps soldiers.

301030501.TextContent:
Soon after, the dining table was piled high with steaming hot, delicious dishes.
Airona and I exchanged a glance and picked up our bowls.
Before long, the dishes before us were completely devoured.

301030601.TextContent: (You discover that the Man in Black has infiltrated the scene...)

301030701.TextContent: (You catch up to the Man in Black. You and the Man in Black are at daggers drawn.)

301030801.TextContent:
The moment the words fell, a dense Void Engram suddenly rose from beneath my feet. The mist, like threads spun from a nightmare, tightly bound me.
My heart was violently squeezed. I collapsed to the ground, unable to breathe for a moment.
However, just as I was about to lose consciousness, the Man in Black opposite me suddenly stopped their attack.

301030802.TextContent: Man in Black: Well, this is curious.

301030803.TextContent: Man in Black: You seem completely unaffected by the Void Mist!

301030901.TextContent:
In the chaos, it seemed someone was calling my name.
"{*me.name*}, wake up..."

301031001.TextContent:
At this very moment, I received a message from Airona:
"Tina is at the Cliff Ruins. Please come assist me."

301040101.TextContent:
The Man in Black disappeared into the Void Engram.
By the time I regained consciousness, I was already back in reality.

301040201.TextContent: (You and Airona quietly admire the fireworks by the sea...)

301040301.TextContent: After successfully rescuing the citizens on site, I also reached a safe area...

302010101.TextContent:
The shard in my hand suddenly erupts with a surge of Void Engram and strikes my mind. Within the chaos, a voice calls out to me-
"Accept my gift. I grant you a blade... one that can sever fate itself. Offer your strength and soul unto me. Together, we shall cleanse the world of its sins..."

302010102.TextContent:
My soul is being swallowed whole. I forget fear. I forget resistance. Then... Airona's voice shatters the darkness like a beacon-
"That's Hruga's power! Don't accept it! Don't accept it! DO NOT accept it!"

Her voice pulls me back, and I run... I don't know for how long... until the breeze of Asteria finally brushes against me again...

302010301.TextContent:
After putting on the gloves, I pass through the electric barrier without issue. The outer layer must be made of a special material that insulated against the current.
Airona clings tightly to my sleeve the whole time. When she sees I am unharmed, she finally exhales in relief...

302010302.TextContent: Olvera: The artisan's workbench is over there. I'll check if anything else looks suspicious.

302010303.TextContent: A torn box reveals a letter inside...

302010304.TextContent:
After Airona put on gloves, she easily passed through the electric protection. The special material on the surface of the gloves seemed to insulate against electricity.
Seeing that she was unharmed, I also breathed a sigh of relief.

302010501.TextContent: We helped Tina rescue the civilians trapped in the flames. One by one, as they saw her face, their expressions softened into relief...

302010601.TextContent:
When Tina meets eyes with the boy, a memory stirs-
Three years ago, during the final battle with the Dark Mist Legion, this very boy crossed the battlefield alone... and carried the defeated Denvel away from the fire.
Tina still remembers the last words he spoke back then-
"Denvel... I'm taking you home..."

302010602.TextContent: You found an unopened document while checking Tatta's belongings.

302010701.TextContent:
Message from Olvera:
I'm heading out to investigate who tampered with the medal. Let's meet up at the Artisan Street.

302020201.TextContent:
You've done well, partner.
Tatta's been safely transferred to the Defense Corps Garrison. I know you're looking into the Void Engram too. Tatta might know something. Come meet us when you can.

We're near Arena Town. Careful not to get lost.
-Tina

302030301.TextContent:
The last person we want to see shows up-Denvel.
"Tatta... I can't believe you're siding with Asterleeds. Even you've betrayed me."
Before Tatta can explain, Tina and Olvera charge at Denvel. But Denvel unleashes the power of Void Engram, trapping them in danger.
Suddenly, a shadow darts forward-Tatta stabs toward Denvel with Jayden's relic...
"Denvel... please... wake up. Come home with me!"
The relic shines with intense light, engulfing us all...

302030302.TextContent:
The Hand of the Void begins fusing into Denvel's body. His glowing red eyes slowly fade. An explosion of Void energy surges out from within him, dispersing the surrounding void.
Back in reality, Denvel still stands locked in a tense standoff with Tatta and me. The relic's energy clashing with the Void force within him.

302030303.TextContent:
Past memories washes away Denvel's rage, his expression contorting into sorrow... He moves again.
"Tatta... Tatta is still waiting for me to come home..."
But suddenly, the Void Engram materialized into dozens of hands and clutch at him, and Hruga's voice echoed again-
"Denvel... will you betray yourself as well? Let your rage consume you. I shall grant it power!"
Denvel's fury reignites. His eyes burn once more.

302030304.TextContent:
Void Engram erupts from his body, completely overwhelming Jayden's relic barrier.
None of us can withstand that force. Before Denvel takes Tatta and disappears, Tatta tosses Jayden's relic to Tina-
"Take care of this for me!"

302030305.TextContent:
Denvel suddenly strikes me back and knocks the relic from Tatta's hand before seizing him and escaping.
"Take care of this for me!"
As Tatta is carried off, those are his last words. Tina catches the relic mid-fall.
The Void Engram around Tina and Olvera finally begins to fade...

302030306.TextContent:
Tatta tries to activate the Imagine Seed, but to feel all his Adventurer drain from his body and collapses in exhaustion.
It is a long time before he manages to stand again.

302040101.TextContent: Partner, stay back! If they spot you, we're in trouble!!

302040102.TextContent: Tina: Shh... hold up. Someone's here.

302040103.TextContent: Tina: Those are... Dark Mist Legion members. So this is where they've been hiding...

302040104.TextContent: Tina: Over there. That looks like a small trail.

302040201.TextContent: You successfully rescued Tatta from the dungeon.

302040202.TextContent: After handing me the love letter, Rab the Kitten, or should I say, Jerrad, bolted out of sight.

302040203.TextContent: I reported the situation to Valeria (without revealing Rab's true identity) and returned the letter.

302040204.TextContent:
No matter how I pressed her afterward, Valeria refused to say another word.
And so the strange letter episode during the Seabreeze Festival came to an end.
As for what the girl truly felt... maybe only the sea breeze knows.

302040205.TextContent:
Letter at the Door

Good day, Star of Asterleeds:

To keep this short-I know your secret.
This letter isn't the place to explain. Please meet me at the The Spinning Rudder.

-Rab the Kitten

302040206.TextContent:
Rab's Note #1

"I am Rab, the letter courier for the Seabreeze Festival. I'm a shy little kitty, so I can't talk.
If you want me to deliver something, just leave it with me. If it's something special... give me a pat."

302040207.TextContent:
Rab's Note #2

"If this special matter involves a blonde young lady... please give me a wave."

304010101.TextContent:
{*me.name*}, I've made a major discovery about the Kanamians!
Meet me at the Shrine near the cliff! Don't get caught by the guards.

- Airona

304010201.TextContent: A sharp blast of a horn suddenly rang out...

304010301.TextContent:
After repelling the Kanamians...
Rotroani: Ancestors bear witness! Warriors of Kanamia! Once again, your blades have driven back the enemy!
Kanamia Warriors (in unison): HOO-RAH!
Rotroani: Now let us see... who dares to challenge the Kanamia Tribe, blessed by our ancestors?
Airona (muttering): This isn't good... Things just got worse...
Olvera: Damn it...
Rotroani (furious): Olvera?! You traitor! How dare you show your face here!

304010302.TextContent: You explain the disaster spreading across the plains and reveal that Denvel's goal was to consume the entire region.

304010401.TextContent: Airona: <style="emph-gn">{*me.name*}</style>, I saw the guards escorting Tina and Olvera towards <style="emph-gn">the big house to the north</style>.

304010501.TextContent: After defeating the Kanamia Reformists who ambushed the Corps convoy...

304010502.TextContent: You found a white bone mask near the military convoy...

304010601.TextContent: Following a fierce battle, Necalli is captured. The remaining Reformist fighters have ceased fighting.

304010701.TextContent:
Necalli's gaze turns cold.
In a flash, his blade slices the air like silver lightning,
and drives straight toward Rotroani.

Rotroani stands his ground, completely motionless.
He has not even the slightest attempt to dodge.
He lets Necalli's blade pierce directly into his arm...

304010702.TextContent: You report to Olvera and Airona that the key to the Forbidden Zone has been recovered.

304010801.TextContent: Quinin: That was a spectacular battle! Both of you did great!

304010802.TextContent: Quinin: Congrats to Tide Envoy for winning this round!

304010803.TextContent: Quinin: Please take a short break and get ready for the final round!

304010804.TextContent: Quinin: Both sides, take your positions! Let the match begin!

304010805.TextContent: Quinin: Congrats to Tide Envoy for advancing. Now, let's move on to the next match!

304020201.TextContent: Byrnhald troops charge the Asterleeds soldiers. With overwhelming numbers, they force the Asterleeds units to fight back.

304020202.TextContent: The ground is littered with fallen Asterleeds soldiers as Byrnhald troops begin securing the battlefield.

304020204.TextContent: Rab?! Clowry?!... I saw you both defending our homeland to the death.

304020205.TextContent: Rab, you were a dutiful warrior, protecting the craftsmen until your last moment...

304020206.TextContent: Clowry, rest in peace, I visited your family last month, they are healthy.

304020301.TextContent: Was that Olvera's voice? Is Olvera nearby?

304020401.TextContent: (The wind bore the melody of a flute...)

304020402.TextContent: 2D Cutscene: The priest and the Survival Instincting Asterleeds Defense Corps soldiers can no longer fight. To buy Olvera time, they blow the whistle to lure the enemy away.

304030101.TextContent:
Rorola slowly closes her eyes. Two tears slide down her cheeks.
Moments later, she opens her eyes again, now glowing a strange red.
Her expression has twisted into fury, almost as if possessed.

304030102.TextContent:
Rorola: Ancestors... still can't forgive you...
Olvera: Rorola? What's wrong?
Rorola: The laws of the Kanamians... a traitor's crimes must never be forgotten.

304030103.TextContent: Rorola begins radiating a dark energy. Her movements grow erratic and unstable.

304030104.TextContent:
Olvera: Everyone, stay sharp! Something's not right with Rorola.
Rorola: All of this is your doing... If you hadn't started the war...
Tina: Rorola, calm down. We're not your enemies.
Rorola: I hate you! All of you!

304030201.TextContent: A massive tornado begins to form, tearing across the Kanamia Tribe.

304030202.TextContent:
Olvera: That's... a Void Sigil! No... Denvel only needs one more!
Tina: The storm's already forming. It's too dangerous to stay here!
Rorola: Father... everyone... please be safe!
(Rorola runs into the village)
Olvera: Wait! It's too dangerous!
Tina: Olvera! We need to find the chieftain and help the Kanamians escape!

304030203.TextContent: After helping the Kanamians evacuate to higher ground...

304030301.TextContent: After clearing the Dragon Claw Valley...

304030401.TextContent: Nierala: May the Ancestors protect you! Are you alright? Was it serious?

304030402.TextContent:
The Kanamians rush forward, showering the heroes with flowers and food in gratitude for saving them.
The celebration goes on for a long time... until the crowd finally begins to disperse.

304030403.TextContent: Chieftain Rotroani, Priestess Rorola, welcome back!

304030404.TextContent: <style="emph-gn">{*me.name*}</style>, Kanamia Brave, you are our hero!

304030405.TextContent: Thank you, <style="emph-gn">{*me.name*}</style>. May the ancestors bless you!

304040101.TextContent: Oh, great and noble ancestors, I, Rorola, 31st priestess of the Kanamia Tribe, call to you now.

304040102.TextContent: Allow us to approach your Sacred Relic. Let your power once again protect and bless the Kanamia.

304040103.TextContent: In the name of our warriors, I call to you. Led by your guidance, we of Kanamia face danger with pride, never backing down.

304040104.TextContent: I, Rotroani, guardian of the tribe, follower of the ancestors, pray before you.

304040105.TextContent: Grant us the right to draw upon the <style="emph-gn">Sacred Relic</style>, and open the gates of the <style="emph-gn">Forbidden Zone</style>, where the eternal meets the living.

304040106.TextContent: Rorola: May the light shine eternal.  May the ancestors' blessing be upon us. May the moon's phases lead Kanamia.

304040107.TextContent:
As I touch the Legacy, Engram surrounds me like a drifting mist.
A field of pure blue fills my vision. Fragments of forgotten memories begin to resurface...

304040109.TextContent: Eternal ancestors, I seek your wisdom. Bring peace to the hearts of our kin, and let this discord fade.

304040110.TextContent: I yearn for your strength. Punish the aggressors, and scatter the Void.

304040111.TextContent: Exalted ancestral spirits, let our spirits be joined once more. In return, we offer our deepest devotion.

304040112.TextContent: And so, the Kanamians once again received the grace of their ancestors.

305020101.TextContent: I filled Tatta in on everything that happened after we split up on the plains.

305020201.TextContent:
Tatta gives a relieved smile.
He pulls out a brush and paper, and begin copying down the contents from Denvel's notebook.

305020301.TextContent: Before Dorothy can even finish her thought, another wave of monsters storms into the Artisan Guild.

305020302.TextContent: Before Dorothy can even finish her thought, another wave of monsters storms into the Artisan Guild.

305020401.TextContent: A Void monster, thought to be unconscious, lashes out at Dorothy. At the last second, Olvera appears and shields her from the blow.

305020501.TextContent:
With a heavy sigh, Olvera pulls out a worn, yellowed envelope.
A letter left behind by Ted.

305020601.TextContent:
A massive upheaval struck the city.
Engram surged uncontrollably, and in a critical moment, I became the vessel, absorbing it all. As a result, I temporarily lost the ability to fight... and blacked out.

305020701.TextContent: I am flying through the sky.

305020801.TextContent: This area is now fully covered by a Void barrier, spreading outward along the natural Engram vines.

305020901.TextContent:
After breaking through the Void barrier, I come face-to-face with Denvel, standing between me and the sigil.
I endure his attacks, pushing forward step by step toward the center.
When I reach the core, I pour every last drop of Engram I had into it.
The spreading Void finally begins to fade from the plains. Denvel is left wounded from the clash.

305030101.TextContent:
"{*me.name*}, welcome back!"
Tina runs straight toward me and wraps me in a tight hug. Standing beside her is Olvera, visibly exhausted.
The silver-haired commander says nothing. She gives a faint smile and nods at me in silence.
Then comes Airona. She stares at me as if she had something to say. But in the end, she says nothing. She simply smiles, clear and gentle as spring water.
Only when I see them all again... I realize the long shadow cast over the plains... is finally gone.

305030201.TextContent:
Tatta tries once more to persuade Denvel to let go of his obsession, but Denvel strikes back, convinced Tatta is standing in his way.
Pushing everyone aside, Denvel disappears alone.
Tina saves Tatta in time, and the entire exchange is silently observed by a priest hidden nearby.

305030301.TextContent: When news of the planned assault on the Dark Mist Fortress spreads, a wave of cheers erupts through the crowd.

305030401.TextContent: Olvera's move: Officially, she accepts the order to arrest Tina. In truth, it is all an act, a staged capture to cover her escape.

305030501.TextContent: A few days later, the city of Asterleeds has been fully restored.

305040101.TextContent:
When Tina wakes up, Olvera immediately pulls her into an emotional embrace. Airona, standing nearby, quietly wipes her eyes.
Tina gently pats both of them, then turns and gives me a reassuring smile.
Behind her, the Asterleeds Defense Corps soldier erupt in cheers, rushing forward to surround her.

305040201.TextContent: The Core of Stellarium embedded in Tina's body began to dissolve.

305040301.TextContent:
Before I can even process what's happening, my entire body is consumed by Engram.
My mind goes blank for a moment. I gasp for air instinctively, reaching out toward the deep blue tide.
And in that instant... the ice of memory begins to melt...

305040401.TextContent: In what's clearly a plateau, I once fought alongside Hruga... against Golems sent by the Divine.

305040601.TextContent:
I lost track of how much time passed. Just as I thought everything had come to a standstill,
the faint outline of a girl slowly emerged before me.

305040701.TextContent:
The Engram engulfs both Tina and me. For a moment, the entire world falls away.
I feel weightless. Everything dissolves into a sea of haze. Blue light shimmers and surges. Nothing else remains in view.
As the silence thickens, a faint voice breaks through. It's a girl's quiet call in the dark.

305040801.TextContent:
The glow of Engram gradually fades. As the mist of the Void disperses, reality returns.
When I open my eyes again, I see Tina falling from the sky.
Her body seems weightless, as if she can be swept away by the wind and vanish into the sky itself.
I call out to her. I run. At the last second, I reach out my hand.
I catch the wind.

305040901.TextContent:
Tina is still speaking when Airona and Olvera return.
They spot Tina unharmed... and both finally let out a breath of relief.

305041001.TextContent: As the townspeople notice my presence, they begin gathering around, offering thanks for saving the plains.

305041101.TextContent:
But no matter how loudly I call her name, Tina doesn't respond. She murmurs to herself, as if in a trance.
The blue glow of the Engram that once surrounded her is now dimming...
That's when I realize... the Core of Stellarium is beginning to dissolve.

305041201.TextContent: (Black Screen PH) After entering the Dark Mist Fortress and clearing the dungeon.

305041301.TextContent: The dissolution around Tina's chest slowly fades as the Core of Stellarium begins to stabilize again...

305041401.TextContent: We teleport into the Shrine. (Scene asset pending. Configuration depends on final map resource.)

305041501.TextContent: For a split second, I hear a faint, unfamiliar laugh. The air around me turns cold. But as I blink, it's gone, as if it never happened.

305041601.TextContent: Close your eyes and drift into the dream. Weariness and sleepiness slowly drift away from me. In this twilight state, however, I sense Engram energy swirling around me.

305041602.TextContent: In that hazy moment, I reached toward the deep blue tide. And in that instant, the ice of memory began to melt...

305041605.TextContent: ???: End this catastrophe, and reclaim your true self.

305041606.TextContent: ???: Your destiny lies where your journey began.

305041701.TextContent:
After bidding farewell to my companions, I received a message from Airona. It was just a short line.
"I'll wait for you at Town Gate Square."

305041801.TextContent:
A small glass bottle was placed in my palm.
Inside were specks of soft white and blue, like the pearls and waves of Asterleeds.
I knew they were Sea Lily petals.

305041901.TextContent:
Before I could react, Tina shoved a metal object into my hand.
It was a somewhat old compass.

306010101.TextContent:
(Black Screen PH)
(Airona and I gaze out across the distance. Lallipar is visible, and beyond it, the towering Pillar of Divinity.)
(Airona waves a hand in front of my face, snapping me out of the moment.)

306010201.TextContent:
(Black Screen PH)
(Fafala leaps in and parries a monster's ambush.)
(Fafala shields Airona from a sneak attack.)
(I nod to Fafala and turn back to rejoin the battle.)

306010301.TextContent:
(Black Screen PH)
(I step toward the Illusory Bloom, drawing my weapon, ready to destroy it but only to be stopped.)
(Lothar and Boyce arrive. Boyce, Lothar's attendant, stands at his side.)
(Lothar takes over and eliminates the Illusory Bloom himself.)

306010401.TextContent: Airona tosses and turns in her sleep, face tense with discomfort. She seems trapped in a nightmare. Suddenly, her eyes snap open-

306010501.TextContent:
A massive roc swoops down, beating its wings twice before landing on the windowsill.
Its feathers are sleek and gleaming, but from the fierce look in its eyes, petting it seems like a terrible idea.

306010601.TextContent:
A young girl clutches an envelope in her hand.
She hurries to the window, removes a metal tube from the roc's leg, and slips the letter inside.
The roc lifts its head with an arrogant flick, spreads its wings, and vanishes into the sky.

306010701.TextContent:
(Black Screen PH)
(I use Insight. The path toward the Forsaken Trail and Fallen Valley glows faintly.)
(But the direction of the mine flares with intense light, the view overexposes, distorting everything.)
(I look toward the northeast, then shield my eyes from the blinding glare.)

306010801.TextContent:
(Black screen placeholder)
(The protagonist follows Airona forward but notices a blooming Illusion Flower nearby.)
(Curious, they reach out to touch it-suddenly, visions flash: weapons clashing, flames of war, hateful whispers.)
(The illusion shatters. Airona pulls the protagonist back, but she's left weakened and in pain, unable to move.)

306020101.TextContent:
(Black Screen PH)
(I look down at the sprawling Sislaetha Mines. The view is breathtaking.)
(Airona explains the mine's importance. The two decide to check the outer outpost first.)

306020201.TextContent:
(Black Screen PH)
(A child plays by the roadside. Across the street, Alphonse watches quietly. Nearby, Darya lurks in the shadows.)
(A mounted soldier nearly tramples the child, but I rush in and save them. The soldier tosses down a coin pouch in apology.)

306020301.TextContent:
(Black Screen PH)
(A Creed member arrives, announcing the distribution of Starsoul Flasks.)
(Airona is bumped on the shoulder. I glance toward the person who caused it. It's a girl [Darya].)
(Darya casually walks away, steps light and confident. Moments later, Airona realizes the Starsoul Flask Fafala gave her is gone.)
(The chase begins.)

306020401.TextContent: It's a struggle, but I manage to catch the girl who stole the Starsoul Flask.

306030101.TextContent: After a lot of effort, Darya finally moves the giant stone aside. A hidden tunnel entrance is now exposed to daylight.

306030201.TextContent:
(Black Screen PH)
(A minecart suddenly accelerates and shoots out of the tunnel. The noise stirs nearby monsters. They lash out with fangs and claws.)

306030301.TextContent:
(Black Screen PH)
(The Blackstone Squad arrives. Some block off the workers' quarters, preventing anyone from entering. Others head inside, and moments later, drag out a sickly miner.)
(I instinctively move forward, but Darya, just as furious, pulls me back and shakes her head.)
(A few soldiers pin the miner down. The one who looks like their captain grunts, showing it's not enough yet.)
(The Blackstone guards begin spreading out across the area, patrolling with silent menace.)

306030401.TextContent: The Blackstone Legion gathered enough laborers and regrouped.

306030501.TextContent:
Pain. Resentment. Despair. Countless negative emotions rise like a tidal wave, crashing down with suffocating force. My mind begins to slip. My will starts to crack... Is this where it ends?
No. I grab hold of something. Small, dense... the core of pure darkness. I wrap it with Engram and shatter the barrier!

306030601.TextContent:
(Black Screen PH)
(The Blackstone Squad drives the miners into the tunnel where I'm waiting. Those who lag behind or hesitate are struck with the hilts of swords.)
(The captain turns and leaves. The others drag the frail workers behind him. A squad of soldiers follows in silence.)

306030701.TextContent:
(Black Screen PH)
(The sorting area buzzes with activity. Machines churn as miners carry and pack raw ore. Squad officers patrol between workbenchs.)

308010101.TextContent: I look around... but Reiner is nowhere to be seen.

308030101.TextContent: (I convey to Grieg the full context of the conflict between Darya and Boyce.)

308040101.TextContent: (I recount all events at the Sislaetha Mines to Lamond.)

308040102.TextContent: (I inform Jerrad that Tina is about to regain her freedom.)

308040201.TextContent: (I relay the details of the Sislaetha Mines to Tina, along with Lamond's perspective.)

309010101.TextContent: Lothar purified the crystal, but it left him weakened.

309010201.TextContent: Airona approaches, visibly troubled. But when she sees the protagonist and Jerrad, her expression lights up with joy.

309020101.TextContent:
The Illusory Bloom radiates energy outward. Pilgrims (multiple) flee under the guidance of priests and Creed's Guards (at least one).
A little girl (Tessi from Lallipar) trips and falls, Rita (NPC from the pilgrims' rest area) helps her up and they leave together.
The protagonist watches the Illusory Bloom solemnly.

309040101.TextContent:
The protagonist waits in place. Fafala sneaks up quietly, trying to surprise them. But the protagonist turns around just in time.
Fafala's smile fades into nervousness, hands hidden behind her back (holding a gift).
The protagonist tilts their head, waiting for her to speak.
Fafala: Um, actually...
She shyly presents the gift-a cute doll. The protagonist reacts with surprise.
Lights glow in the distance. The festival begins. Fafala leads the protagonist toward the celebration.

309040102.TextContent:
It's a lively banquet. The protagonist is warmly welcomed by all.
The protagonist dodge two kids begging for a story. Hunter nervously tries to toast, but Rita pulls the protagonist away first.
Finally, surrounded by NPCs, the protagonist looks up at the sky lit by floating lanterns.

420000101.TextContent: A cat suddenly jumps out, lets out a single meow... then darts off into the distance.

420002101.TextContent: The village chief takes me to check on the injured. While tending to one of them, I spot a caravan manifest tucked in his clothing. The name signed at the bottom is Gate.

420002102.TextContent: After Gate leaves, I contact the Asterleeds Defense Corps to arrange transport for the bullions.

420002103.TextContent: I report the smuggling case to the Asterleeds Defense Corps first... then set off to meet with Griff.

420002104.TextContent: I tell Razi about Griff's search for the missing caravan, and ask whether he knows anything about its route.

420002105.TextContent: I bring up the bullions to Griff carefully without accusing him. He Frozens in panic before I even finish my sentence.

420002106.TextContent: Griff is escorted away in restraints. One of the Asterleeds Defense Corps soldiers turns to me and nods gratefully.

420003101.TextContent: Johnny steps forward on his own... surrendering to Victor without resistance.

420003102.TextContent: When Victor begins pressing me aggressively, Johnny seizes the moment and manage to escape.

420003103.TextContent:
I calm him down first... then summon Councilor Victor.
Johnny's eyes widen in surprise when he sees Councilor Victor, but the shock quickly twists into anger.

420003104.TextContent: Johnny grabs the parts and the banner from my hands... and storms off without looking back.

420003105.TextContent: Johnny clenches the parts and the banner tightly... then storms off without looking back.

420003106.TextContent: Victor's men rush forward and seize Johnny on the spot.

420003107.TextContent: I speak openly to both Johnny and Victor, sharing what I really think.

420003108.TextContent: Johnny walks off under Asterleeds Defense Corps soldiers escort toward the Statue of the Hero to atone for his actions. Now, it's just Victor and me left.

420004101.TextContent: Sera lets go of her obsession. She no longer seeks Kulao.

420004102.TextContent:
Sera and Kulao speak the same vow at the same time, a heartfelt proposal in unison. In front of the crowd, they collapse into each other's arms, weeping together.
The cheers continue long after, until they slowly ease apart.

420005101.TextContent: Daniel: Oh, my dear Bapharian! I finally find it. Good thing <style="emph-gn">this</style> hasn't been discovered by Emma yet...

420005103.TextContent: Daniel: I'm sorry, Emma... but I need this money badly.

420005104.TextContent: Daniel: You'll have to deal with the missing wheat yourself.

420005201.TextContent: You disrupted the residents' daily life... The pursuit ends in failure.

420005202.TextContent: Too much time is lost... The pursuit ends in failure.

420007101.TextContent: Grady: Oh my! You actually found the big one!

420007103.TextContent: Grady: Whatever! The treasure's got to be inside, right?! We're gonna be rich! Haha!

420007201.TextContent: Grady: The outside world is scary! I'm staying in the shop for life!

420007301.TextContent: Grady: Come on, come on... just come one out already...

420007302.TextContent: Grady: Don't just stand there staring at me. If you're crossing the bridge, get moving!

420007303.TextContent: Grady: You people... why do you all keep getting in the way of my fortune?!

420008101.TextContent: Synster's Assistant: That suspicious brat snuck in again!!!

420008402.TextContent: Heir to the lifeblood of the Vil Ancients, executor of the dead and the living, Great Sorcerer of the plains...

420008403.TextContent: I now hear you! Speak your wishes loud and clear... petitioners!

420008404.TextContent: Honored Great Sorcerer Synster! I beg of you... Call upon the power of lifeblood and return my husband to me!

420008405.TextContent: Very well. Your wish shall be granted, Jenny. But remember... convince your granddaughter Camille to comply!

420008501.TextContent: Synster: Return... return... return to us, Eder!

420008502.TextContent: "Eder": What... is this place? Wait... Jenny?

420008503.TextContent: Jenny: Eder? Is that really you, Eder?

420009105.TextContent: "Smart" Child: Its name is Biki! Look, it has two big ears too!

420009106.TextContent: "Smart" Child: If I'm not mistaken... this must be Ee-chan's partner!

420009108.TextContent: Alex: Thank you, little one... but this isn't Ee-chan's partner.

420009109.TextContent: "Smart" Child: Oh... really? I thought they were best friends...

420009110.TextContent: Alex: Still, I appreciate you trying to help.

420009111.TextContent: "Smart" Child: Alright then. I hope you find its real partner soon!

420009201.TextContent: Alex: Wait, adventurer. Hold on! Ee-chan seems to have picked up something.

420009302.TextContent: Alex: Is that... a statue of Ee-chan?

420009303.TextContent: ???: That's right. It's a statue of it.

420009304.TextContent: ???: Ee-chan, it's been a long time. You're here for this <style="emph-gn">water jar</style>, aren't you?

420009306.TextContent: Alex: Water jar? Oh! So Ee-chan's "partner" isn't another creature but this jar... the exact one shown on the statue!

420009307.TextContent: Alex: Then this must be... the strap from the jar!

420009309.TextContent: Yasser: Ah, I forgot to introduce myself. Name's Yasser. I'm the warden of this forest.

420009310.TextContent: Yasser: Ever since the Asterleeds Independence War, my family's been watching over this place... six, maybe seven years now.

420009311.TextContent: Yasser: This statue here... it represents Ee-chan's kindness.

420009312.TextContent: Yasser: Back during the thick of the war, some wounded soldiers collapsed here... They'd gone too long without water.

420009313.TextContent: Yasser: Ee-chansaw them, hurt, dehydrated. So it fetched clean water... and saved them all.

420009314.TextContent: Yasser: If everyone were as kindhearted as Ee-chan... maybe there wouldn't have been a war in the first place...

420009315.TextContent: Alex: Ee-chan... I never knew you did something like that.

420009316.TextContent: Alex: And to think... I'm your friend, a researcher of your kind, and I didn't know any of this. I'm ashamed.

420009317.TextContent: Ee-chan: Yee yee! Yee yee yee!

420009318.TextContent: Alex: It's alright... I'm just a little overwhelmed.

420009319.TextContent: Alex: Since you've found your "partner"... Let's head home. I'll walk with you part of the way.

420009321.TextContent: Alex: Thank you, adventurer... And thank you, Uncle Yasser. Seems I still have a lot to learn...

420009322.TextContent: Alex: Oh, by the way... Ee-chan wanted you to have something. It picked this Rudder Anemone along the way while searching for its partner.

420009323.TextContent: Alex: And here's my own thank-you gift. A promise is a promise. Please take it.

420018101.TextContent: Castor brings a piece of Grayson's clothing to the sniffler. The dog sniffs deeply... frowns... then sets off on the trail.

420018201.TextContent: After a round of emergency care, the injured stabilize somewhat...

420018301.TextContent:
Suddenly, a strange rumble shakes the ground. Heavy, mechanical footsteps thunder from behind.
Up ahead, towering before us, a battered Bapharian Legacy Golem lumbers into view... its frame dented and coated in grime.

420018401.TextContent:
Castor sends out a signal to the Asterleeds Defense Corps. Soon, reinforcements arrive, securing the area.
They recover the damaged Golem... and carry off the severely wounded Brigands.

Days later, Seth is on his feet again. Grayson sends word, inviting you to catch up at the Spinning Rudder.

420021403.TextContent: After waiting nearby for a while...

420022001.TextContent: Before Sherry can speak again, Carlis slams down a stack of receipts, thick as bricks, right onto the table.

420022002.TextContent: The moment I ask my question, Carlis's expression twists. Visibly sour.

420022003.TextContent:
At the sight of the cat, the memories surge like a tide.
I understand now what Airona meant. This isn't just any cat.
This cat... and the one who sleeps here, all those quiet, aching memories...
We were all part of them.

420022004.TextContent:
Later, I don't know how Airona did it, but Miss Lucy canceled the commission.
Rumor has it, a small cat is now often seen visiting her home.
And... she smiles more these days.
Some say a black-and-white cat can often be found napping near Minsterhorn.
By the gravestone it guards, sea lilies bloom year-round.
Narulu, my friend... If you could see all this... you'd be happy, wouldn't you?

420022006.TextContent: Airona: Look! It's saying thank you!

420023001.TextContent: Olvera steps out from a hidden spot.

420023002.TextContent: You use lightning's Electromagnetic Core and draw near the sensor. Olvera watches intently, captivated. However, the box remains silent and shows no reaction to your attempt.

420023003.TextContent: You cautiously bring the trap near the box's sensor... Still no response.

420023004.TextContent: You hold up the flying toy to the sensor. With a mechanical click-whir, gears inside begin to spin... The box unlocks.

420031101.TextContent: After a flurry of motion, the diner finally presents the dish. It smells... unusual.

420031102.TextContent:
The Boarrier meat, roasted over high heat, now boasts a golden, crispy crust. Each bite delivers a soft crunch,
while the sinewy inner layers stay springy and firm, creating a satisfying contrast with the flaky outer shell.
With the first taste, the world seems to brighten... Worries vanish. Everything feels... better.
I savor it and just keep going... I may have gotten a little carried away.

420032001.TextContent: A chill runs up your back. Something rushes past you. Fast, silent, cold. In a blink, it's already inside the camp.

420032002.TextContent:
Oh! This is the spot!
The scholar dashes toward a glowing patch of grass, eyes alight with discovery.

420032101.TextContent:
A striking pigeon with grey-and-white plumage pecks grain from the rim of a wooden bucket nearby.
Its broad chest and powerful wings show it's no stranger to long-distance flights.
One of its claws is wrapped in a bandage. Beneath it, a hint of bright green salve glistens. It's freshly applied and carefully mixed.

420032102.TextContent: Scott deftly shaves down the boar's tusk, then weaves it together with twine, forming a rough but sturdy necklace.

420033101.TextContent: Lure: See that? Right over there.

420033102.TextContent: Lure: Those damn Lizardmen have blocked the path ahead. They're not supposed to be this far here...

420033103.TextContent: Lure: That stranded boat over there... Was someone shipwrecked?

420033104.TextContent: Lure: Maybe we should just forget it. Or... I sneak across by swimming...

420033201.TextContent: Lure: Here we are... Whew... that was a bit more than I expected...

420033202.TextContent: Lure: Ahahaha, right. See, the sheer force of the waterfall causes dips and ridges in the riverbed...

420033203.TextContent: Lure: And the Lizardmen's residual pheromones? They actually attract fish to the area. Which means... this is a perfect fishing spot! Hahaha!

420033204.TextContent: Lure: You look confused, young one.

420033205.TextContent: Lure: Because of the roar of the , the fish here are used to noise. They won't be scared off by voices from shore.

420033206.TextContent: Lure: Haven't you read the Pioneer Bureau's public bestiary? Volume Two, the Lizardmen section?

420033207.TextContent: Lure: You've got to trust me on this. I've got sixty years of fishing under my belt.

420033208.TextContent: Lure: Anyway... go ahead and rig my special bait.

420033210.TextContent: Lure: By the stars of Asterleeds... would something please bite already?!

420033212.TextContent: Lure: Sometimes, just being in a calm, scenic spot like this... that's what really matters. Catching fish? Not always important.

420033213.TextContent: Lure: Ahem... ahem... Fishing is about the waiting. Like most things in life, the outcome matters less than the process.

420033215.TextContent: Lure: Huh? You came all the way here? Oh no. What time is it?!

420033216.TextContent: Lure: I promised Sadina I'd be home for dinner tonight! Dandy, how's she looking?

420033217.TextContent: Lure: Woof once if she's calm. Twice if she's mad.

420033219.TextContent: Lure: Th-Three barks?! No... I'm doomed... Last time she was this mad, I went three days without a drop of oil or salt...

420033222.TextContent: Lure: You'll understand when you're my age, young one. True courage... is owning up to your mistakes.

420033223.TextContent: Lure: Anyway, no time to waste. I've gotta get home!

420033224.TextContent: Later... Lure is thoroughly scolded by his wife.

420034101.TextContent:
The clues all point here. The treasure should be in this exact spot.
But no matter how thoroughly I search... I find nothing.
Off in the distance, a figure approaches. It's the merchant who sold me the treasure map.

420034102.TextContent: Minsterhorn Merchant: Damn, got delayed by those kids from Andrew's group, haven't had time to bury the "treasure" in advance.

420034103.TextContent: Minsterhorn Merchant: Wait... what if the riddle was too easy? Did someone already dig it up?

420037101.TextContent: Time passes... but there's still no sign of Pirlo and the others.

420037201.TextContent:
The three of them seem to have drawn the attention of nearby Blazing Flamers. Looks like they're heading for a confrontation...
...
On the way to the Shrine with Gloria, no further trouble arises. We reach Priest Fabian without incident.
Still, Gloria seems uneasy about Pirlo's sudden disappearance...

420037301.TextContent:
Disheveled and covered in dirt, Pirlo recites sacred words aloud.
Beside him, a smiling Gloria completes her blessing...
Afterward, Pirlo promises to escort her home.
Worried the Blazing Gang might return, Pirlo joins Buddy, splitting off to take a different route...

420039101.TextContent: Fido sniffs the notebook, tail wagging as it picks up its master's scent. Excited, he starts tracking along the ground, eager to find more.

420202101.TextContent: I listen intently for a while... but no sound reaches my ears.

420202201.TextContent: A figure dressed like an adventurer stands silently beside the glowing vegetation. The scholar steps up and pats them on the shoulder.

420202301.TextContent: Suddenly, the scholar snaps their head upward as if they just heard something from the canopy above.

420203101.TextContent: You take the elder's hand and gently guide her back to Jennifer.

420204101.TextContent: Valeria turns and walks away. Moments later, she returns to the counter with a stack of documents in hand.

420204201.TextContent: Bell gestures to his aide. They produce a folder and begin flipping through it. When Bell reaches one particular page... his expression darkens.

420205101.TextContent:
You push aside loose stones and dirt. Buried secrets surface once more. In the damp Void rests a filthy backpack.
Untouched for who knows how long, its contents remain mostly intact, shielded by the bag's fabric. One item stands out immediately: a weathered diary.
Emblazoned on the cover in bold characters-Roy.

420206101.TextContent:
Everyone turned in surprise. The commanding voice came from a tall man, with Deputy Commander Jerrad of the Asterleeds Defense Corps following behind.
Council Chair! Ryan and Carter exclaimed in unison. Lamond nodded and then looked at me.

420207101.TextContent: Swindler: Let's talk this out, whatever amount you want, I'll give it to you...

420207103.TextContent: Carter: This punch is for Roy, you bastard.

420208101.TextContent:
There was a piece of paper and used bandages on the ground, with a few drops of crimson nearby.
Sander sniffed the bandages and began to pant and stomp his feet incessantly.

420208201.TextContent:
In a nearby clearing, Sander stands rigid, locked on a creature ahead.
Its mouth is moving... chewing something.

420208301.TextContent:
Sander slowly approaches the bag. He nudges the bracelet hanging from the strap... then curls up beside it.
He seems to fall asleep.

420210301.TextContent:
The ground trembles. Dust pours down from the top of the energy tower. Hills lifts his head, eyes wide and unblinking.
Irritated by the dust, his eyes redden and begin to water.
Minutes pass. The quake slowly subsides... and nothing else seems to happen.

420210401.TextContent:
Once Hills finishes speaking, he turns away and begins jotting down notes in his journal.
Time slips by. Then, suddenly, he seems to remember something. He gives me a quick wave and hurries off.
In his rush, he doesn't notice a folded letter fall out of his notebook...

420211101.TextContent: I explain my intentions to Valeria...

420211201.TextContent:
Valeria breaks down.
Around her, staff and other Pioneers exchange uneasy glances.

420211202.TextContent:
Later, though the Creed offers its forgiveness...
Valeria still receives a formal reprimand from the Pioneer Bureau.

420212001.TextContent:
A roar of engines breaks the tension. The gang leader guns the throttle, speeding off with his crew toward the island. The yacht's wake crashes into frothing waves, and by the time it settles... all you see is the gate slamming shut behind them.
Looks like you'll need to find a way to the island too- Wait... is that a yacht over there?

420212002.TextContent: (A sudden wave of stun hits. My balance shatters, and gravity pulls hard beneath my feet. The force drags me straight down into the depths of the gate.)

420300000.TextContent:
Smith and Misty struggle as they climb a rope.
Despite his elderly appearance, Smith is actually quite skilled at rope climbing.
The two quickly reach the top...

420300001.TextContent:
After setting the anchor point, Smith and Frio's group used jet devices to leap onto the floating island.
Though safety ropes were secured to the anchor, the scholars showed no trace of fear.

420300002.TextContent:
While Smith and Frio were arguing endlessly,
Destinee walked straight to the storage compartment,
using the keystone found earlier to open it.
Inside was a rare transparent vessel,
usually a vacuum chamber used by the gods to preserve precious items.
Inside it floated an egg-shaped object emitting a faint purple glow...

420300003.TextContent:
Smith threw the legacy to the automaton, which skillfully caught the square vacuum chamber,
then stored it inside its steel body.

It then disappeared into the mountain stream.

420300005.TextContent:
The Colossus that had fallen with a loud crash kept emitting sharp screeching sounds,
and soon it stood up again to attack the group.

420300101.TextContent:
After discussing with the Kanamia guide about the conditions needed for the ceremony,
it was required to collect some materials...

420300102.TextContent:
As the bonfire blazed, thick smoke obscured everyone's faces.
Each person present took turns placing a stone beside the bonfire to show their reverence,
while a mercenary who had stolen an artifact took the opportunity to place the stolen item into the stone pile.
As the smoke cleared, the valley echoed with the melodious howls of wolves...

420300103.TextContent:
After checking that the Jump Mice-5 was still operational, we set off towards the ground.
I used a wind field to break through the strong winds, leading the way.
Destinee held onto Ora tightly, following behind with the Jump Mouse-5.
Soon, we finally returned safely to the ground...

420300104.TextContent:
The automaton attacked Nappo, who couldn't dodge in time and fell off a cliff.
Destinee, in an attempt to save Nappo, was also swept by the wind into the valley...

420300201.TextContent: Smith trembled as he struggled to climb across the rope to the other side...

420300202.TextContent:
Smith trembled as he was pulled up into the air,
it seemed he was trying very hard to suppress his fear...

420300203.TextContent:
The moment Misty received the legacy, his eyes suddenly turned sharp.
It was too late to take back the legacy,
Misty's movements became incredibly swift as he instantly snatched away the letter opener.
At the same time, he threw two dark red smoke bombs with his other hand...
The entire action was completed almost in an instant.
In no time, the smoke engulfed us, and the legacy in our hands disappeared...

The disguise of honesty and simplicity faded away, replaced by an abyss-like malice.
At this moment, Misty exuded a menacing aura and disappeared into the smoke...

420300204.TextContent:
After some busy work, several tents were set up, and the scholars gradually moved in with their large bags.
Each one had eyes full of curiosity and anticipation. It seemed there was much work ahead.

420300205.TextContent:
The old scroll was filled with dense writing,
the characters were thin and long, with various twists, resembling branches of different shapes.
This writing was unlike any known language...

420300206.TextContent: Klein quickly processed the ingredients, and a fragrant aroma spread throughout the camp...

420300207.TextContent:
Charlie and Klein were immersed in their tedious decoding work,
communicating with each other in almost incomprehensible terms.
As the content of the scroll gradually became clear,
Charlie's expression changed from anxiety to excitement.

420300208.TextContent: After a short while, Misty finally brought Smith, who was studying the ruins nearby...

420401101.TextContent:
What exactly went wrong with the Webber Energy Network?
What is meant by the so-called dark side of Asterleeds?
In many commission quests, there have indeed been mentions of "people living in the sewers"
related rumors... but-

420401102.TextContent:
While pondering, a flash suddenly appeared before my eyes,
followed by a dull pain and a thick, foul-smelling black smoke engulfing me.
In such an unbearable and harsh environment,
I don't know if it counts as good news,
I quickly lost consciousness...

420409101.TextContent:
A pitted old pot was set up in the dark sewer,
Lazy Ruby finally started preparing his 'delicious stew.'

Surprisingly, Ruby seemed like a different person when he touched the ingredients.
Lighting the fire, cutting the meat, seasoning... his actions were as swift as a master chef.
A strange aroma immediately spread,
temporarily masking the stench of the sewer...

420502101.TextContent: Bessan stuffed a note into my hand, rushing off while giving instructions, then with a plop, jumped into the water and disappeared.

420502201.TextContent:
(You stuff Bessan's things and two cups of Seeking Berry Juice behind the coral, then carefully take out the package.
As you stand up to leave, you suddenly feel a gust of wind beside you. When you look back, the area behind the coral reef is empty.)

420502202.TextContent:
"Wh-y- are- the-re- two- cups?" echoed a familiar voice through the cavern.
"L-u-c-k-y you! The drink shop's got a 'buy one, get one' deal! " you said, mimicking her voice.
Joyful laughter echoed in the distance, gradually fading until it dissolved into silence.

420510101.TextContent:
The sea monster's belly is sliced open.
Amid the stench and rotting food,
a black diamond the size of a fist is found...
Pitch black, lightless, embedded in the monster's gut.
It seems to devour all the surrounding light.
A dark, dreadful force lurks within.

420702101.TextContent:
Merle pulled out his portable scent mixer,
blending the ground ingredients into a fragrant perfume...
The surrounding monsters caught the scent and lowered their heads.

423021501.TextContent:
Alex ground the herbs and mixed them with the ingredients he'd prepared.
He finally produced an orange, bubbling potion...

423021601.TextContent: The three of them assembled the trap components together...

423030301.TextContent:
Waiting under a tree with Esmeralda,
we chatted about Smith, Misty, and her dream.
Just as I was dozing off, a demi-human appeared.

423030302.TextContent:
With a scary growl, a massive adult Boarrier emerged on the cliff.
It glared at us viciously as if it would tear us apart the next second.
The Boarlet that Esmeralda was soothing broke free and ran toward the giant boar.

423030303.TextContent:
Esmeralda took out a small bottle she carried with her.
As she twisted the cap open, the scent from inside spread through the air.
The frenzied Boarrier began to calm down...

423030304.TextContent:
The poachers released all the animals, trembling.
The little animals darted back into the woods...

423030305.TextContent:
We returned to Asterleeds with Esmeralda.
The Asterleeds Defense Corps soldiers seemed quite pleased when the bounty hunters were handed over to them.
Only after thoroughly interrogating the group did we return to the Windhowl Canyon...

423031101.TextContent:
After a while...
A goblin sneaked in, looking around the camp.
Noticing no one was around, it began its evil deeds...
Just as it was looting, a trap exploded,
filling the air with a large amount of Red Powder,
the goblin was startled.
Covered in Red Powder, it cursed and ran out of the camp...

423031201.TextContent:
Grayson skillfully washed and cut various materials, dividing them into several portions by weight.
He produced an orange-yellow liquid with a very unpleasant smell...

423031202.TextContent: Defeat the Boarrierrier to obtain the Crimson Pouch (replaced by battle after the cloth monster)

423031601.TextContent: There was indeed an unusual noise nearby...

423031602.TextContent: The strange knocking sound appeared again.

423031603.TextContent:
We reached the spot Leif directed us to,
but just as we prepared to search for Ereka,
Victoria suddenly disappeared, leaving only a small note behind:
Thank you, adventurer, but the next part of this journey is my personal quest!
Until our paths cross again!

423031604.TextContent:
"I have to tell my brothers! The ship spirit is real! "
"This is absolutely incredible! "
Before I could explain anything, he ran off muttering to himself.

423031801.TextContent:
With a crisp click, optical camouflage peels away like an insect shell.
As the shimmer fades, a Bapharian Legacy Golem slowly appears.
Its cold, metallic frame radiates a suffocating pressure.

423032001.TextContent:
Wally simply repaired a device strapped to his wrist
and then activated this relic.
The relic released a seemingly real illusion and emitted a loud taunting sound.
The guards at the door were distracted and came over to watch...

423032701.TextContent:
The two begin working on leather their own way.
Malorie, wanting durability,
applies thick grease to the map.

Tristrom, aiming for aesthetics,
paints ornate designs atop the grease.

In the final baking step,
the leather can't take the strain and splits into three pieces...

423040401.TextContent:
The expression on Scar's face gradually became ferocious, and he glared at me fiercely before wrestling with me.
While dealing with him, I took the opportunity to ignite the signal flare hidden in my palm.
The white light pierced through the oppressive darkness and exploded in the air.
Wally and several members of the Robber Gang quickly appeared...

423040402.TextContent:
After that, Nemolais followed the agreement and found someone to complete the repair of the Webber Energy Network.
The journey in the underground world came to an end.
It's time to return to the surface to report back and question the client...

423041001.TextContent: As soon as I attracted the attention of the surrounding monsters, the person who had been lying on the ground immediately got up and hid in a concealed spot with great agility.

423041101.TextContent:
Thud-thud thud thud-thud
With rhythmic knocking sounds, a huge figure slowly emerged from behind an iron pipe.
Each step was accompanied by a "creak creak" sound. It was a gigantic machine!
The machine's face was a pitch-black Void, with faint red light flickering inside.
It looked particularly sinister in the dark sewer.
Following closely behind the machine was a small figure dressed in a brightly colored clown costume.
Wearing a strange clown mask, standing next to the gigantic machine, it looked very bizarre.

423041102.TextContent:
The Riddler sang and danced,
disappearing at the end of the corridor with the gigantic machine...
Although Carl was quite displeased with this,
due to fear of the machine's threat,
he could only watch helplessly as the clown left...

423041301.TextContent:
After the eulogy, Mortimer lowers Ms. Chrissie's body into a dark pipe.
The corpse touches the sewage and an acidic fugue begins.
Bubbles rise around Chrissie.
They wrap her body, draining away the remaining energy,
creating a strange thrust
that slowly pushes her deeper into the pipe...
Her body glows like emerald, pulsing smaller and smaller, until it vanishes.

423050801.TextContent: The goblins were driven off, and there seemed to be a musical instrument in the corner.

423050802.TextContent: The instrument lay there silently, with snapped strings and a broken neck.

423051601.TextContent:
The Anemone workers skillfully ground the Salt Algae into powder and applied it to the stung areas.
The swelling and redness subsided instantly.

After some time, the injured workers gradually regained their composure...

423051602.TextContent:
The moment I touched the cobalt liquid, a sharp pain shot through my fingertip.
The fluid raced up my arm toward my brain.
My vision became shrouded in a strange cobalt haze, and the world began to melt.
The nearby cliff trembled violently, and countless coral worms burst out from the cave...

A slick voice whispered in my ear,
"Don't touch the third coral... That's Zofitton's heart..."

423060101.TextContent:
After a long while, the Asterleeds Defense Corps finally arrived and drew a close to the incident.
The scholars were thrilled and eagerly exchanged their findings on the way back.
Destiny quietly left with the egg-shaped artifact that recorded sound...
The organization behind Misty and their true agenda
remained a mystery for the time being.

423060201.TextContent:
Buck stacked stones to build a simple rain shelter,
then struck flint to ignite a bundle of dry hay.
In the flickering firelight, he swiftly rolled into a crevice between the rocks.
Moments later, the flames surged upward, thick smoke billowing into the air,
swept by the mountain wind toward the depths of the forest -
from a hidden trail came the sound of hurried footsteps, mixed with sharp, guttural screeches.
The food thief has finally stepped out of the shadows.

423060701.TextContent:
Kingsley opens the vial with trembling hands.
He took a sip, and the pallor on his face began to fade...

423060801.TextContent:
The moment Sylvia presses the switch, the world freezes.
Darkness swallows everything. A violent pull yanks me into nothingness-it's like being tossed into a spinning drum.
When my feet touch ground again, the stun lingers.
The scene before me is unfamiliar. Sylvia stumbles, gripping a tree for balance, looking embarrassed.
This isn't the location of the first Legacy. The test has failed...

423060901.TextContent:
A giant Boarrier charges and topples the slowest Brigand.
Then it spears him with tusks like lances...

423060902.TextContent:
Scarlet disappears into the forest with ingredients.
After a while, she returns carrying a steaming pot of stew...

423061001.TextContent:
With a crisp snap, the chest opens. But inside is no treasure-just a note:
What isn't yours will eventually vanish.

423070401.TextContent:
The detective pulls out a strange box that should be a Legacy. It somehow shrinks my height.
I look just like a child now. No makeup needed, I've become a completely different person...

423070402.TextContent:
Just as I'm deep in thought, a sudden flash of light fills my vision, followed by a dull thud to the back of my head.

Then the world spins...

423070403.TextContent:
The detective suddenly raises a hand and a burst of light erupts. His face, his voice, his entire image... all sweep away like a storm.

I try to grasp his features, but they dissolve into nothing...

423161001.TextContent: Colorful ribbons fall from a basket onto the main road and children's laughter rises from below

440001101.TextContent:
Master Hamilton provided a thorough explanation of Gemcrafting principles and techniques.
Every single detail was explained multiple times...

440002101.TextContent:
A young artisan peeked out from behind a huge legacy hint of panic flashing in his eyes,
but it was quickly replaced by excitement.

The young artisan quickly put down the tools in his hands and walked towards us.
All the while, he kept trying to wipe the sweat from his face, but the grease only smeared further across his cheeks.

1010110505.TextContent: ???: Hey, relax. See? I'm still alive and kicking...

1010110506.TextContent: ???: But... if you keep standing around...

1010110507.TextContent: ???: We're gonna get swallowed alive by these things!
